Como no conseguía trabajo fijo decidió iniciar como comerciante informal y empezar a vender juguetes, sandalias, carteras etc. En la actualidad trabaja solo recorriendo las calles de los pueblos que visita para vender mercadería como Milagros, Santa Elena, Playas. La mercadería la vende por unidad a diferentes precios. 

El quiere continuar con sus ventas de mercadería variada para darles una buena vida a sus hijos de 8 y 4 años por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo juguetes, sabanas, sandalias etc. Una de sus proyecciones para los próximos 5 años es tener un capital estable para ubicar un local.
texts.en:
Luis, 27 years old, is a working man who has enjoyed taking care of his children since youth, as he married his wife very young. Living in an urban area known as a suburb, he has worked as an informal merchant for several years.

Since he could not find a permanent job, he started working as an informal merchant and started selling toys, sandals, wallets, etc… Now he works alone along the streets of the neighborhoods that he visits to sell his merchandise such as Milagros, Santa Elena, Playas. He sells his merchandise by the unit at varying prices.

He wants to continue his sales in diverse merchandise in order to give a good life to his children of 8 and 4 years old. For this reason, he wants to use this loan to purchase toys, sheets, sandals, etc… One of his securities for the next 5 years is to have a stable uncome to open a shop.

loans.use: To purchase toys, sheets

loans.name: Roberto Isaias

texts.es: Roberto es agricultor, su esposa atiende la parte comercial, sus hijos lo mayores le apoya en el trabajo agrícola. El cliente considera hacer mejoras en su vivienda poco a poco como planes. Desde hace 22 años se dedica a la agricultura. El principal problema es la afectación de plaga y enfermedades, así como el robo de la producción. Inicio con apoyo de la reforma agraria por medio de la organización cooperativa. Como proyecto para el negocio es  hacer trabajos de conservación de suelo. Este préstamo será invertido en compra de fertilizantes para brindarle el mantenimiento agronómico al cultivo de café. Agradeciendo a la institución ya que le permitirá obtener una cosecha productiva.
texts.en: Roberto is a farmer, his wife handles the business side, and his oldest children help in agriculture. The customer wants to make improvements in his home little by little. He has been a farmer for over 22 years, the biggest problem that he faces are plagues and disease to his crops as well as the theft of production. Roberto began with the help of agrarian reform through a cooperative organization, and as a project for the business they have a conservation project for the soil. This loan will be used to buy fertilizers to give his coffee crops the best care. Roberto is grateful to the institution since it will allow him to have a productive harvest.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to take care of his crops.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es: Consuelo tiene 27 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada. Desde hace más de 3 años se dedica a enseñar danzas típicas a grupos de niños escolares, que estudian dentro de su zona. Asimismo su esposo, quien también es profesor de danza, elabora las vestimentas y mascaras con diseños típicos de su ciudad, logrando venderlas a sus alumnos, de esa manera se genera más ingresos. Considera su trabajo muy rentable, es por esta razón que esta dispuesta a tener mas adelante una tienda de venta de vestuario y disfraces típicos. Es su crédito número 8 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita a que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica. Con el crédito que recibirá, lo invertirá en la compra de telas para elaborar nuevos disfraces.
texts.en: Consuelo is 27 years old. She lives with her husband and her 2 children in a rented home. Since more than 3 years ago, she has taught traditional dances to schoolchildren groups that study in her area. Also her husband, who is also a dance teacher, makes costumes and masks with traditional designs of their city, selling them to their students to generate more income. She considers her business very successful, which is why she has decided to move forward starting a shop to sell traditional clothing and costumes. This is her eighth loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support, and she is thankful to be part of her community bank because all its members are people that she knows are responsible and supportive. She thanks all the people who are part of the loan that she requests as it will be very useful in the progress of her business. With the loan that she receives, she will invest in the purchase of fabrics to make new costumes.

loans.use: To purchase fabric to make traditional clothing

loans.name: Sonia Esperanza

texts.es:
Doña Sonia, tiene 56 años de edad, reside en San Miguel departamento de San Miguel, vive con su hermana, se dedica a la venta de utensilios de cocina, verduras y flores, desde muy pequeña trabaja en los mercados municipales, actualmente tiene un puesto permanente donde ofrecer flores naturales en todas las épocas del año, frutas, verduras y utensilios de cocina.
Ella necesita invertir en el negocio y para realizar dicha inversión solicita un préstamo para compra verduras como tomates, cebollas, zanahorias, chiles y repollos. Su intención de invertir en este momento es por la llegada de la navidad y fin año donde la gente busca verduras para preparar la cena del 24 y 31 de diciembre, le ayudara a atender la demanda y a recibir mejores ganancias ya que por la época todo se vende más caro.
Su objetivo es mejorar la atención y el servicio a los clientes, adecuar el negocio y seguir trabajando por su bienestar.
texts.en:
Doña Sonia is 56 years old. She lives in San Miguel, department of San Miguel. She lives with her sister. She works selling kitchen utensils, vegetables and flowers. Since very young, she has worked in the municipal markets. Now she has a permanent stand where she offers natural flowers at all times of the year, fruits, vegetables and kitchen utensils.

She needs to invest in the business, and to realize this investment, she has requested a loan to purchase vegetables such as tomatoes, onions, carrots, chilies and cabbage. Her intention is to invest now for the arrival of Christmas and New Years when people are looking for vegetables to prepare their dinners for the 24th and 31st of December. She will help to meet the demand and receive more profits because at this time of year everything sells for more expensive.

Her goal is to improve her customer service, adapt her business and keep working for her wellbeing.

loans.use: To purchase tomatoes, onions, carrots, chilies and cabbage

loans.name: Karen Estela

texts.es:
Karen es socia del Banco Comunal “3 de Mayo II”  del distrito Puno,  provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 19 años, de estado civil soltera, la señorita en la actualidad sigue estudiando.

Trabaja con el Movimiento  Manuela Ramos desde hace 07 meses,  su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de tienda general.

Su nuevo crédito es de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en juguetes, y toda clase de muñecas para venderlos en navidad, y es ayudada por su mamá.

Su visión en terminar su carrera y tener un depósito de abarrotes.

Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la unión y la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Karen is a member of the “3 de Mayo II” communal bank in Puno district, Puno province and department.  She is 19 years sold, single and still in school.

She has collaborated with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 7 months.  Her initial loan was for 300 new soles that she used to invest in her general store.

Her new, 800 new sol, loan will be used to buy toys and all kinds of dolls to sell for Christmas.  Her mother helps her.

Her vision is to finish her career and to have a grocery warehouse.

What she enjoys about her communal bank is the unity and the ease of the loan.

loans.use: To buy toys, like dolls, to sell for Christmas.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: María mujer con una gran iniciativas de búsqueda de fuente de trabajo, se desempeña en la aria de comercio desde hace 13 años unas de las dificultades que se le ha presentado es el alza de los precios de los productos al comprarlo implicando aumento en los precios al venderlo. Bajando un poco las ventas al inicio de aplicar el nuevo precio pero después se estabiliza las utilidades. Inicio con mucho esfuerzo con fondo propio después ingreso en los programas de préstamos que ofrecemos como financiera y ah ido mejorando las ventas la tener mayor variedad y cantidad. El préstamo que está solicitando es para la compra de: arroz, frijoles, aceite, harina, papel higiénico, jabones de baño, lavar trasto y de lavar ropa, y otros productos aumentando sus inventario para aumentar sus utilidades. Tiene como proyecto la aplicación del local así mismo la captación de más clientela. Siendo una realizada el crecimiento de su negocio y el mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: María is a woman with great initiative in her search for employment; she has worked as a salesperson for over 13 years. One of the problems that she faces is the increase in prices for products that she buys which means that she has to increase her sale prices as well which leads to a decrease in María’s sales but later her profits stabilize.  María began her job with a lot of hard work and her savings and later with loan programs that were offered through Kiva’s field partner. She has been improving her sales by having a greater variety and quantity of products. The loan will be used to buy: rice, beans, oil, flour, toilet paper, soap, dishwashing liquid and detergent and other products increasing her inventory to increase her profits. She has as a project to expand her store so that she can have more customers. Once María grows her business her quality of life will improve as well.

loans.use: To buy basic household goods to stock her business.

loans.name: Roger Osvaldo

texts.es:
Roger Osvaldo V. R., tiene la edad de 24 años, está Soltero. El quiere comprar unos implementos necesarios para poder seguir con su pequeño negocio del arreglo de motocicletas. El necesita compra un compresor, herramientas de precisión y una prensa entre otros. El hace años se ha dedicado a este profesión y tiene la experiencia para seguir mejorando su negocio por lo cual necesita realizar la compra de esas maquinas.  Con ésta opción él pretende mejorar su calidad de atención al cliente y a su vez ir generando dinero para seguir adelante con su vida y negocio. 
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Roger Osvaldo V. R., 24, is single.   He wants to buy some tools that he needs to continue with his small motorcycle repair shop.  He needs a compressor, precision instruments and a press, among others.  He has been in this profession for years and has experience to continue improving the business which is why he needs to buy these machines.  With this option he intends to improve the quality of his customer service while generating money to continue with his life and business.

This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan with the easiest terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy some tools for the shop.

loans.name: Maria Bersabe

texts.es:
Doña María D. 63 años D. edad, vive con su esposo Daniel, tiene casa propia ubicada en San Miguel, departamento D. San Miguel, se dedica a vender especias (condimentos), como achiote, pimienta, cominos en el mercado municipal D. San Francisco Gotera en Morazán.
Ella quiere diversificar su negocio y solicita un préstamo para que le ayuD. a comprar verduras y frutas aprovechado que para estas fiestas estos productos tienen mayor demanda,
Su objetivo es innovar en el mercado, atraer a nuevos clientes para el consumo D. lo que se ofrece mejorando así el negocio, creciendo como comerciante y desarrollándose en una nueva actividad que espera le traiga buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
María, 63, lives with her husband, Daniel.  She owns her house located in San Miguel, San Miguel department.  She sells spices (condiments) like achiote, pepper and cumin in San Francisco Gotera’s Municipal Market in Morazán.

She wants to diversify her business and is asking for a loan that will help her buy vegetables and fruit taking advantage of these festive times when these products are in higher demand.

Her objective is to innovate in the market, to attract new customers to buy what she offers thus improving the business and growing as a merchant and developing in a new activity which she hopes will bring good profits.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Maame Abana

texts.en:
Maame Abana K. is married and has five dependents.  Her husband is an electrician. Abana has received a junior high education. She cooks beans and serves them with gari (cassava) and fried plantain at Abura. . She assists her husband in the general upkeep of their home. Her loan will be used to buy more ingredients to cook for sale. Abana hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a shop.
In this picture, Abana is dishing out the beans. The bowl in front of her has fried plantain in it.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients to cook for sale.

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa K. is married and has four children. Her husband is a farmer. Adjoa has received a junior high education. She sells clothing and underwear at Abura.  She assists her husband in providing the basic needs of the family. Her loan will be used to buy more clothing and underwear for resale. Adjoa hopes to reinvest her new profits.

loans.use: To buy more clothing and underwear for resale.

loans.name: Gerbert Ernesto

texts.es:
Don Gerbert, tiene 41 años  de edad, reside en Usulután, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y crianza de cerdos, él vive con su familia, posee casa propia, tiene experiencia en el cultivo y se dedica desde hace mucho a esta actividad como fuente de ingreso para la manutención de su familia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, como abono, fertilizantes y tratamientos para plagas, elementos que son muy necesarios para el proceso de la siembra, con esta ayuda y contando con todos los materiales espera realizar una buena siembra y que el desarrollo de la milpa sea adecuada para que de buena producción.
Su objetivo es como cada año realizar un buen trabajo y de este obtener lo necesario para ayudar a su familia con la alimentación que necesitan.
texts.en:
Don Gerbert is 41 years old and lives in Usulután. He lives with his family in their home, which he owns. He grows corn and raises hogs and over a long period of time he has gained experience in agricultural activities, which has become a source of income for supporting his family.
 
He is requesting a loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and pest control treatments, which are essential for the sowing process. With this aid and with all the necessary supplies, Don Gerbert hopes to see progress in the corn that will be sufficient for producing a good crop.
 
His goal, as in each year, is to do a good job so that he can provide for his family with the food they need.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and pest control treatments

loans.name: Omar De Jesús

texts.es:
Con 51 años de edad y 2 hijos, Fernando Quintero Toro, vio en la carpintería el oficio que le permitiría garantizarle un mejor futuro a su familia, situación que lo llevó a trabajar desde hace 18 años en esta labor que también es considerada un arte. 

Actualmente este microempresario requiere del apoyo económico para comprar una máquina que le permitirá mejorar y agilizar sus procesos, así como la adquisición de un taladro y materia prima, lo que se traducirá en productos de mejor calidad y mayores ingresos para el sustento familiar. 

Abrir su local en un lugar diferente a su casa, es el sueño de este empresario quien así logrará exhibir mejor sus productos e incrementar sus ventas, que son todavía muy limitadas.
texts.en:
Fernando Quintero Toro is 51 years old, and he has two children.  He saw in carpentry the trade that would allow him to guarantee a better future for his family.  He has been working in carpentry for 18 years, and he considers it an art.

This small businessman now needs financial support to be able to buy a machine that will allow him to improve and accelerate his work.  He will get a drill and raw materials, which will translate into better quality products and greater income to support his family.

Opening a spot in a place other than his house is this small businessman’s dream.  That way he will manage to better display his products and increase his sales, which are still very limited.

loans.use: Purchase machinery for carpentry business

loans.name: Luzmila Hilda

texts.es:
Luzmila es socia del Banco Comunal “3 de Mayo II”  del distrito Puno,  provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 50 años, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 02 hijos (01 independiente), realizo estudios de educación secundaria.

Trabaja hace más de 07 años con el Movimiento  Manuela  Ramos, su préstamo inicial fue de  S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, el cual lo invirtió en su negocio de venta de al por menor de productos de confitería y golosinas.

Ahora solicitará un nuevo crédito de S/. 600.00 nuevos soles, comprará  ocho paquetes de huevo para venderlos en la panadería.

Su sueño es tener una empresa para vender productos de Herbalife.

Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Luzmila is a member of the “3 de Mayo II” communal bank in Puno district, Puno province and department.  She’s 50 years old and in a common law relationship.  She has two children, one of whom is independent.  She finished secondary school.

She has collaborated with the Manuela Ramos Movement for over 7 years.  Her initial loan was for 300 new soles that she invested in her retail sweets and snacks business.

Now she is asking for a 600 new sol loan to buy 8 packages of eggs to sell in the bakery.

Her dream is to have a firm to sell Herbalife products.

What she likes about the communal bank is its punctuality and responsibility.

loans.use: To buy 8 packages of eggs to resell at retail in the bakery.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal “3 de Mayo II”  del distrito Puno,  provincia de Puno y departamento de Puno, tiene 38 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 06 hijos, la señora realizó estudios de educación secundaria.

Trabaja con el Movimiento  Manuela  R. desde hace 02  años,  su  préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de animales menores.

Su nuevo crédito es de S/. 1200.00 nuevos soles, con el que podrá comprar en gran cantidad de cuy, gallinas, cuenta que hará sus casas de los animales, participan en este negocio sus hijos, su esposo trabaja en construcción.

Su visión es que sus hijos salgan profesionales para que no tengan problemas económicos.

Lo que le gusta de su Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y intercambiar palabras con las socias.
texts.en:
María is a member of the communal bank, "3 de Mayo II," located in the Puno district of Puno province in the department of Puno. She is a 38-year-old married woman with six children. She has a high school education.

María has been working with Movimiento Manuela R. for two years. The first loan she received was in the amount of 300 nuevos soles. She invested those funds in her business selling small animals. 

Her new loan is in the amount of 1200 nuevos soles. This loan will allow her to buy a large quantity of guinea pigs and hens. She also plans to build housing for them. Her children help her with her business and her husband works in construction.

Her dream is that her children will become professionals so that they won't have any financial worries. She appreciates the punctuality of her communal bank and the fact that it gives her the opportunity to talk with the other bank members.

loans.use: Purchase of small animals such as hens and guinea pigs, among others.

loans.name: Aracely Noemi

texts.es:
Aracely de 27 años, tiene una niña de 10 años y está separada de su esposo pero eso no la detuvo para ser una mujer emprendedora y empezar a obtener su propio dinero vendiendo ropa como comerciante informal. 

En la actualidad vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso en donde trabajo durante años vendiendo ropa. Tuvo una oportunidad de tener un lugar en la Bahía (lugar utilizado por los comerciantes para vender su mercadería a un muy bajo costo) y se ubico como comerciante informal. En la actualidad  trabaja sola en diferentes horarios vendiendo juguetes, ropa a las personas que asisten a la Bahía. 

Uno de sus objetivos es seguir vendiendo mercadería para asegurar el futuro de su hijo por eso quiere comprar juguetes y ropa. En el futuro quiere mejorar su casa y darle un buen futuro a su hija.
texts.en:
Aracely, 27, has a 10 year old daughter and is separated from her husband.  That didn’t stop her from being an enterprising woman, though, and start earning her own income selling clothing as an informal merchant.

She currently lives in a periurban area, called Paraíso, where she worked for many years selling clothes.  She had the opportunity to have a place in La Bahía (a place used by merchants to sell their merchandise at very low cost) and she set herself up there as an informal merchant.  Currently she works alone at various schedules selling toys and clothes to people who frequent La Bahía.

One of her objectives is to continue selling merchandise to assure her child’s future.  This is why she wants to buy toys and clothes.  In the future she’d like to make some home improvements and provide a good future for her daughter.

loans.use: For toys and clothes.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua A. is married and has four children. Her husband is a carpenter.  She has received junior high education.  Ekua cooks banku and serves it with okra and pepper sauce at Abura, which she has been doing for twenty years. Ekua uses her income to assist her husband in taking care of her family. She is going to use the loan she hopes to receive to buy bags of maize to prepare banku and to sell. With the new profits from her expanded business, Ekua plans to put up a structure where her customers can eat.

loans.use: To buy bags of maize to prepare banku and to sell.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en: Abena K. is married and has six dependents. Her husband is a plumber. She has been through junior high school.  She sells biscuits, slippers, soft drinks and other items at Abura. Abena uses her income to assist her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills.  She will use the loan to purchase more of groceries for resale. Abena hopes to  reinvest her new profits.

loans.use: To purchase more of groceries for resale.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy; ella tiene 42 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de colchas, cubrecamas y sabanas y también se dedica a la venta de ropa en general, la socia vende en forma ambulatoria e independiente, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere tener una tienda para que pueda vender cubrecamas y sabanas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nancy, 42, is a member of the “SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA” communal bank which is located in Urubamba in Urubamba province, Cusco department.

She is single and has four children.  She alternates her daily chores with a business selling comforters, bed spreads and sheets.  She also sells clothing in general.  She sells both independently and as a street vendor.  Through this business she is able to help her children get ahead.  She wants to have a store where she can sell bed spreads and sheets.  She is asking for the loan to buy merchandise.

She is happy for the loan and commits to repay her installments.

loans.use: To buy merchandise.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba A. sells maize at Abura.  Aba has received a senior high education.  She is married and has six dependants. Her husband is a farmer. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy additional bags of maize for resale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loans.use: To buy additional bags of maize

loans.name: Joaquín

texts.es:
Joaquín N. Q. tiene 58 años. Es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene  3 hijos, todos mayores de edad.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Joaquín se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, chocho y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es mejorar la vivienda y tener una vida tranquila.

Le gusta salir a pasear y celebrar la fiesta del Señor Jesús del Gran Poder.
texts.en:
Joaquín N. Q. is 58 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolívar.  He has three children, all of whom are adults.

The members of the community bank "Jesus del Gran Poder" meet in the community of San Ramón in the canton of Chillanes, 35 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The members of this group all work in agriculture.

Joaquín works in agriculture planting corn and a variety of beans.  He buys and sells in the market in the Chillanes canton on Sundays.

He is asking for this loan to purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizers so he will have a good quality crop.  The support of the loan will help financially meet his needs.  He confronts challenges like plagues, sickness, and weather changes.  His dream is to improve his home and have a calm life.

He likes to take walks and celebrate the feast of Señor Jesús del Gran Poder.

loans.use: Purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizer

loans.name: Nana Ekua

texts.en: Nana Ekua T. is married and has two children. Her husband is a chain saw operator.  She has been through senior high school.  Nana cooks banku to sell. She also sells gari, canned tomatoes, groundnuts and sugar at Abura. Nana assists her husband with the basic needs of the family. Nana will use the loan to buy more foodstuffs to sell and other ingredients to cook banku to sell to expand her business. With the new profits from her expanded business, Nana plans to build a shop.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Mariano Victoriano

texts.es:
Mariano Victoriano P. S. tiene 85 años. Es soltero, vive solo, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Mariano se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una vida sin tantas necesidades.

Le gusta descansar y bailar en las fiestas del Señor Jesús del Gran Poder.
texts.en:
Mariano Victoriano P. S. is 85 years old, single, and lives alone in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolívar.  He does not have children.

The members of the community bank "Jesus del Gran Poder" meet in the community of San Ramón, located in the canton of Chillanes about 35 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The members of this group all work in agriculture.

Mariano works in agriculture planting corn and beans.  He buys and sells in the market in Chillanes canton on Sundays.

He is asking for this loan to purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizer so he will have a good quality crop.  This loan will help him meet his needs financially.  He confronts challenges like plagues, sickness, and weather changes.  His dream is to have a life without so many necessities.  

He likes to relax and dance at the feasts of Señor Jesús del Gran Poder

loans.use: Purchase seeds, manure, and fertilizers

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eduarda; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de helados, ella tiene una heladería que vende en las calles de la ciudad de Urubamba,la socia tiene varios carritos que trabajan vendiendo helados en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de helados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los helados y también para comprar un carrito heladero.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eduarda, 39, is a member of the “SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA” communal bank located in Urubamba, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

She is married and has three children.  She alternates her daily chores with ice cream sales.  She has an ice cream shop and sells throughout Urubamba’s streets.  He has several little carts that work selling ice cream and he wants to expand the business.  She is asking for a loan to buy ice cream making ingredients and also to buy an ice cream cart.

She is happy for the loan and commits to repay.

loans.use: To buy ice cream making ingredients and also to buy an ice cream cart.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua N. sells cooked rice. She also sells bagged gari, groundnuts and sugar at Abura. She is divorced and has three children. She sees to the well-being of her home. Her loan will be used to buy ingredients to cook for sale to expand her business. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a shop. Efua has displayed the bagged items on the table for sale.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to cook for sale

loans.name: Luis Octavio

texts.es:
Luis Octavio C. Y. tiene 52 años. Es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Luis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar la mejor educación a los hijos.

Le gusta descansar, bailar en las fiestas del Señor Jesús del Gran Poder y visitar a la familia.
texts.en:
Luis Octavio C. Y., 52, is married living with his wife and children in Chillanes canton, Bolívar province.  He has four children.

The JESUS DEL GRAN PODER communal bank is located in San Ramón which is in Chillanes canton, 35 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The members of this communal bank are exclusively farmers.

Luis is a corn and broad bean farmer.  His purchases and sales both occur in Chillanes canton during the Sunday market.

He is asking for a loan to buy seed, manure and fertilizers so that his crops will be of good quality.  The loan’s support will help him economically to meet his needs.  They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and weather variations.  His dream is to provide his children with the best education.

He likes to relax and dance at the Señor Jesús del Gran Poder feasts and to visit the family.

loans.use: To buy seed, manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Akouvi Fostine

texts.fr: Fostine est mariée  et  âgée de 38 ans. Elle a un enfant. Elle fait le commerce de pagne  pour pouvoir améliorer les conditions de vie de  son enfant. En effet, elle exerce cette activité il y a de cela 10 ans et s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé.Elle redistribue ensuite au marché local adidogomé. Elle est née à Tsévie et  habite adidogomé. Elle  espère  acheter  avec le nouveau crédit  10 pièces de pagnes phoenis et 15 pièces de pagnes hitarget.
texts.en: Fostine is married and 38 years old. She has one child. She sells "pagnes" (pieces of colourful West African fabric) in order to improve her child's living conditions. She has in fact been carrying out this business for ten years and gets her supplies at the large market in Lomé. She redistributes them afterwards at the local market in Adidogomé. She was born in Tsévie and lives in Adidogomé. She hopes to buy ten "Phoenix pagnes" and 15 "Hitarget pagnes" with the new loan.

loans.use: Purchase of "pagnes"

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana Francisca; ella tiene 46 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella vende diferentes tipos de comida y también vende gaseosas y cervezas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar y gaseosas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Senora Juana Francisca belongs to the "San José de Urubamba" communal bank, which is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, in the Cuzco region.

Senora Juana Francisca is 46 years old, single, and has a son. She combines her daily activities with running a restaurant, where she sells different types of food and also sodas and beers. She works from 8am to 7pm. She wants to improve and expand her restaurant, and is seeking the loan to buy hings for cooking and sodas, which she will buy wholesale.

She is happy that she can access the loan and promises to complete her repayments on time.

loans.use: The member of this communal bank is seeking a loan to buy things for cooking, and sodas which she will buy wholesale.

loans.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba S. is married and has six dependents. Aba has received senior high school education.  Her husband is an electrician. Aba cooks banku (a dish made with maize flour) at Abura for sale. Aba has been preparing banku for sale for five years. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to buy more maize flour in order to expand her business. Aba hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loans.use: To buy more maize flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ingredients for preparing his dishes.

loans.name: Zenobia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Zenobia; ella tiene 61 años. La socia es soltera, y tiene 01 hijo; la socia se dedica a la venta de comidas, ella trabaja en el mercado de arco pata, ella educa a su hijo y desea lo mejor para él es por eso que año tras año se dedica a trabajar arduamente y ella elabora comidas caseras y vende en un stand pre fabricado por ella misma. La socia desea comprar al por mayor los insumos tales como azúcar, arroz, harinas, aceite y otros. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos y elaborar sus comiditas. 

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Senora Zenobia is a member of a communal bank called "Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco" ("New Dawn of Cuzco"). The communal bank is located in thee district of Huanchac, in the province and department of Cuzco.

Senora Zenobia is 61 years old. She is single, and has a son. She dedicates her time to the sale of food, working in the Arco Pata market. She educates her son and wants the best for him: for this reason she works hard, year after year, making homemade dishes and selling them at a stall specially built for the purpose. She wants to buy staple ingredients such as sugar, rice, flour, cooking oil, and other things. She is seeking the loan to buy ingredients and make her dishes.

She is happy to be eligible for the loan and promises to complete her repayments on time and in the proper place.

loans.use: The member of this communal bank is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for her dishes.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario M. P. tiene 39 años. Es soltera, vive con la madre, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Rosario se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir trabajando y tener una vida mas tranquila.

Le gusta festejar las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Rosario M. P. is 39 years old. She is single and lives with her mother in the settlement of Chillanes, in Bolívar Province. She has no children. 

The members of the "Jesus del Gran Poder" communal bank are from the San Ramón community in Chillanes, located around 35 minutes from the office [of the field partner] there. All the members of the bank work in agriculture.

Rosario dedicates her time to growing corn and beans. She buys and sells in Chillanes in the market on Sundays. 

She is seeking the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers so that her crop is of high quality. The loan will help her financially, to afford what she needs. She faces challenges such as infestations, crop diseases and the variability of the climate. Her dream is to continue working and to have a life with fewer worries.

She likes to celebrate local festivities.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JOSE DE URUBAMBA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Leonardo; el tiene 54 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de helados, el juntamente con su esposa trabajan en este negocio de venta de helados que venden en las calles de la ciudad de Urubamba, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar una máquina para hacer los helados.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Senor Leonardo belongs to the to the "San José de Urubamba" communal bank, which is located in the Urubamba district and province, in the Cuzco region.

Senor Leonardo is 54 years old, and is married with 3 children. He combines his daily activities with running a business selling icecream, together with his wife. They sell their icecream in the streets in the city of Urubamba, and he wants to expand and improve his operation. He his seeking a loan to buy a machine for making the icecream.

He is happy that he can access the loan and promises to complete his repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy a machine to make icecreams

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy calves.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel L. Q. tiene 70 años. Es casado, vive con la esposa, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 5 hijos, todos son casados.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es dar la educación a los hijos para que sean profesionales y tener buena salud para seguir trabajando.

Le gusta descansar y bailar en las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Manuel L. Q., 70, is married living with his wife in Chillanes canton, Bolívar province.  He has five children, all now married.

The “JESUS DEL GRAN PODER” communal bank is in San Ramón which is located in Chillanes canton, 35 minutes from the Chillanes Office.  All the members of this communal bank are farmers.

Manuel is a corn and broad bean farmer.  His purchases and sales both take place at the Chillanes Canton Market on Sundays.

He is asking for a loan to buy seed, manure and fertilizer so that his crop will be of good quality.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and weather variations.  His dream is to provide education for his children so that they will be professionals and to have good health to continue working.

He enjoys relaxing and dancing at the local fiestas.

loans.use: To buy seed, manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina tiene 35 años, vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo en una casa alquilada. Hace más de 4 años se dedica a preparar comida que son expendidos a los trabajadores de una empresa publica que la acogió a ella y a su familia. La cantidad de comida que elabora va de acuerdo a la cantidad de pedidos que le hacen sus comensales. Desde entonces vende alimentos para el desayuno y almuerzo. Ella manifiesta estar contenta con su trabajo, ya que sus clientes disfrutan de su sazón y nunca dejan de hacer algún pedido, generándole así mas rentas asimismo puede atender a sus hijos con las tareas escolares. En un futuro tiene el anhelo de tener un restaurante. Es su crédito número 2 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de ingredientes al por mayor.
texts.en:
Karina, 35, lives with her two children and husband in a rented house.  For over four years she has been preparing meals that are sold to employees of a public firm that welcomed her and her family.  The amount of food she prepares depends on the number of orders her diners place.  Since then she has sold breakfasts and lunches.  She states that she is happy with her work because her customers enjoy her tasty preparations and always place orders thus generating more profits for her.  At the same time, she is able to care for her children and help them with their school work.  In the future she’d like to have a restaurant.

This is her second loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial help.  Besides, she enjoys being part of a communal bank because all its members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.

She is grateful to all the people who will fund the loan she’s requesting because it will be very useful for her business’ progress.  

She will use the requested loan to buy ingredients at wholesale.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her meals preparation.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto M. S. tiene 36 años. Es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es construir una casa y dar el estudio a los hijos.

Le gusta salir de paseo con la familia.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto M. S., 36, is married living with his wife and children in Chillanes canton, Bolívar province.  He has three children.

The “JESUS DEL GRAN PODER” communal bank is in San Ramón which is located in Chillanes canton, 35 minutes from the Office in Chillanes.  The members of this communal bank are all farmers.

Carlos is a corn and broad bean farmer.  His purchases and sales both occur in the Chillanes canton market on Sundays.

He is asking for the loan to buy seed, manure and fertilizer so that his crops will be of good quality.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  They face challenges like infestations, illnesses and weather variations.  His dream is to build a house and provide an education for his children.

He enjoys family excursions.

loans.use: To buy seed, manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Nuris Isabel

texts.es: La señora Nuris C. S. es una alegre mujer que vive en Cartagena en compañía de su esposo y tres hijos. Tiene un pequeño salón de belleza en el cual ofrece el servicio de peinados, corte, tintes y planchado de cabello. Este oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica hace varios años con sus hermanas menores y luego perfeccionó sus técnicas con varios cursos en academias de educación técnica en Cartagena. Al principio la microempresaria sólo atendía a su círculo de amigos y familiares cercanos, pero con el paso del tiempo, su clientela fue creciendo y empezó a comprar herramientas y accesorios profesionales. Ella también vende carne de res en horas de la mañana a vecinos y amigos del barrio a quienes les acredita el producto para que le cancelen semanal o quincenalmente. Este es el segundo crédito que tramita con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y su primer Credikiva que planea invertir en la remodelación del piso de la sala donde funciona el salón de belleza y comprar más carne de res. Entre los dos negocios la usuaria obtiene una utilidad mensual aproximada de $700.000. Ella sueña con instalar un gran salón de estética en un lugar diferente a su residencia, con aire acondicionado y otras comodidades que le permitan ofrecer un mejor servicio. La mayor satisfacción que le genera el negocio a la señora Nuris es generar unos importantes ingresos que ayudan al sostenimiento del hogar y especialmente poder atender la educación y los tratamientos médicos de una hija discapacitada.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nuris C. S. is a cheerful woman living in Cartagena with her husband and three children.  She has a small beauty salon where she offers hair styling, haircuts, hair coloring and hair straightening.  She learned this occupation empirically several years ago with her younger sisters and then perfected her techniques through several courses at technical education academies in Cartagena.

At the beginning she only took care of a small circle of friends and close family members at her micro business.  But with the passage of time, her clientele grew and she started buying tools and professional accessories.  

She also sells beef during the morning to friends and neighbors in the neighborhood.  She sells it to them on credit and they repay weekly or biweekly.

This is the second loan she has negotiated with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and her first Kiva loan.  She plans to use it to remodel the floor in the room where her beauty salon operates and to buy more beef.

The two businesses together produce a monthly profit of approximately $700.000.  She dreams with setting up a great beauty salon in a different part of her residence with air conditioning and other comforts that will make it possible for her to offer better service.

Most of the satisfaction that the business generates for Nuris is in generating important income that helps support the household especially for the education and medical treatment of a handicapped daughter.

loans.use: To remodel the floor the living room where the beauty salon operates and to buy more beef.

loans.name: Luís Alfredo

texts.es:
Luís Alfredo  L. C. tiene 21 años. Vive en Unión Libre, vive con la compañera y con el hijo, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene un hijo de 10 meses de edad.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Luís se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener terrenos propios y una casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte, estudiar, salir de paseo festejar las fiestas de carnaval, navidad y del señor del Gran Poder.
texts.en:
Luís Alfredo L. C. is 21 years old, is in a live-in relationship, and has one ten month old son.  He lives in the Chillanes hamlet, located in the Bolívar province.  The members of the V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, located in the San Ramón community, of Chillanes, are exclusively farmers. 

Luís raises corn and beans and makes his sales and purchases at the Sunday fairs in Chillanes.

He is asking for this loan in order to buy seed and fertilizers so that he can increase his production.  This loan will aid him financially and allow him to cover his requirements.  He faces challenges, such as blights, plant diseases, and changes in the weather.  His dreams are to have his own house and land.

He likes to play sports, study, go for walks, attend carnivals, Christmas festivals, and the festival of “señor del Gran Poder.”

loans.use: comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia E. de 56 años de edad, reside en Ilopango, en el departamento de San Salvador. Vive junto a su esposo, un hijo y un nieto de 3 años de edad. Virginia es una persona muy trabajadora la cual se dedica a múltiples actividades para poder obtener mayores ganancias, ella posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos perecederos, así también posee una venta de frutas y verduras, sus negocios están ubicados en su propia casa de habitación. Con su enorme esfuerzo por obtener el bienestar de su familia, Virginia demuestra ser una mujer muy luchadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante junto a su familia, es por esto que solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder contar con el dinero necesario para comprar productos alimenticios y de primera necesidad para surtir la tienda, negocio el cual le trae mayores ganancias, ya que posee muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Virginia E., age 56, lives in Ilopango in the San Salvador department.  She lives with her husband, a son, and a three year old grandson.  Virginia is a very hard-working person who devotes herself to multiple activities to be able to get greater income.

She has a store where she sells perishable products.  She also has a business selling fruit and vegetables.  Both of her businesses are located in her own house.  With an enormous amount of effort on behalf of her family’s well-being, Virginia has shown herself to be a very tenacious woman with a lot of desire to get ahead with her family.

That is why she is requesting a loan to be able to have the money she needs to buy food products and basic needs items to stock her store.  The business brings greater income because she has many customers.

loans.use: To buy basic needs products

loans.name: José Ricardo

texts.es: José Ricardo D. M. de 24 años de edad, reside en El Calvario, ubicado en el departamento de Usulután, el es un joven muy responsable, quien le ayuda a su madre con los gastos del hogar, ya que ellos dos viven juntos, por lo que se apoyan mutuamente para salir adelante. José posee un salón de belleza en su casa de habitación, él posee cinco años de experiencia, tiempo en el que ha ido obteniendo clientes fieles gracias a su excelente trabajo y servicio brindando. José solicita un préstamo ya que cuenta con el deseo de mejorar las condiciones de su negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de productos profesionales para el cuidado del cabello, así mismo cremas para cuerpo y rostro y otros tipos de tratamiento para el cuidado de la imagen de las personas. José sueña con poseer un negocio aún más surtido en donde posea la capacidad para atender más clientes.
texts.en:
José Ricardo D. M., age 24, lives in El Calvario in the Usulután department.  He is a very responsible young man who helps his mother with the household expenses.  They live together and mutually support each other in order to get ahead.

José has a beauty salon at his house, and he has five years of experience.  During that time he has acquired loyal customers thanks to his excellent work and the service he provides.

José is requesting a loan because his wishes to improve his business conditions.  He will buy a greater quantity of professional  hair care products.  He will also buy body and face creams and other types of treatments for taking care of a person’s appearance.

José dreams of having a business that is even better stocked where he has the capacity to take care of more customers.

loans.use: To buy beauty products

loans.name: Arabella Noemi

texts.es:
Arabella Noemi  V. O. tiene 21 años. Vive en Union Libre, vive con la compañera y con el hijo, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 1 hijo de 10 meses de edad.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

Arabella se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener casa propia.

Le gusta salir a pasear en el pueblo.
texts.en:
Arabella Noemi V. O. is 21 years old, and she is in a common-law marriage.  She lives with her life partner and her son in the Chillanes canton in the Bolivár province.  Her son is ten months old.  

The members of the “Jesus del Gran Poder” Communal Bank are located in the San Ramón community in the Chillanes canton.  They are 35 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The members of this communal bank devote themselves exclusively to farming.

Arabella grows corn and broad beans.  She makes her purchases and sales at the Sunday fair in the Chillanes canton.

She is requesting the loan to buy seeds and organic and chemical fertilizers in order to have a quality production.  The support of the loan will help her financially with her necessities.  They face challenges like pest infestations, diseases, and the climate changes.

Her dream is to have her own house.  She likes to take walks in the town.

loans.use: To buy seeds and natural and chemical fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy calves to fatten

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pigs to raise and sell

loans.name: Flor Yolanda

texts.es: Flor Yolanda R. A., reside en Sensuntepeque, en el departamento de Cabañas, en donde vive junto a su madre la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y así mismo vive junto a 3 hijos menores de edad. Flor posee una venta de tortillas en el mercado regional de Sensuntepeque, en donde ha trabajado durante 4 años, razón por la que es muy conocida por la mayoría de personas, y así mismo cuenta con varios clientes fijos quienes compran su productos a diario. Flor es la única que trabaja en su hogar, por lo que debe esforzarse mucho por sostener a su madre y tres hijos los cuales dependen por completo de ella. Flor solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor, ya que desea preveer las alzas de este para el nuevo año, por lo que espera aumentar su materia prima y de esta forma seguir brindando un excelente servicio.
texts.en:
Flor Yolanda R. A. resides in Sensuntepeque, in the Cabañas region. She lives with her mother, who dedicates herself to running the home, and also with her three school-age children.

Flor has a place for selling tortillas in the Sensuntepeque regional market, where she has worked for 4 years. It is a good location because it is well known to most people, and there are also regular customer who buy her produce every day. Flor is the only one in her household who works, and so she must work hard to sustain her mother and three children, who depend upon her for everything. Flor is seeking the loan to buy corn in bulk, so she can avoid the effects of the price rises she expects to see in the new year. With it she hopes to increase her stock of her raw material (the corn) and in this way continue offering an excellent service.

loans.use: To buy corn for making tortillas

loans.name: Zoryana

texts.en:
Zoryana is a market entrepreneur from Novomoskovsk. She sells household supplies and fishing items in the central marketplace of her home town. She is an entrepreneur of determination and focus. She has been working in this sphere of trade for over 10 years. Currently, she makes over 6,000 Grivnyas of net profit each month. 

Zoryana is seeking a loan of 11,300 Grivnyas to purchase additional merchandise and to re-stock her inventory. She likes working with this type of merchandise even though many think it is strange thatshe sells men’s fishing supplies along with other items like knives, axes and blades. Zoryana is hoping to continue growing her business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for sale.

loans.name: José Octavio

texts.es: José Octavio A., es un padre de familia muy responsable, quien trabaja muy duro por sacar adelante a su familia, con quien reside en el municipio de Ilopango, en el departamento de Cabañas. José posee su propio negocio en el cual se dedica a la elaboración de estructuras metálicas como: puertas, balcones, portones y otros más. Él elabora un excelente trabajo, ya que es muy dedicado a lo que realiza, por lo que las personas lo prefieren para realizar sus trabajo. José solicita un préstamo por medio del cual  pueda comprar hierro y de esta forma realizar más estructuras metálicas, muchas de las cuales no puede hacer por falta de materia prima. De esta manera José espera obtener mayores ganancias las cuales sean de mucho beneficio para su familia.
texts.en:
José Octavio A. is a very responsible man, and the father of a family. He works very hard to bring up his family, who he lives with in the toen of Ilopango, in the Cabañas region. José has his own business, making metal structures such as gates, balconies, doors and other things. He does excellent work, because he is very dedicated to what he does. For that reason people choose to come to him to make the items they need. 

José is seeking a loan to buy iron and be able to make more metal structures, because there are many things he cannot make for lack of raw material. In this way José hopes to increase his earnings, which will benefit his family greatly.

loans.use: To buy iron for making metal structures

loans.name: Roman

texts.en:
Roman is married with 2 children. He is a manager in a small firm from Stryi. His company offers energy efficient and made-to-offer doors and windows for both construction and replacement. Roman doesn’t only sell the items but also offers installation services to clients. Roman’s pay is about 2,000 Grivnyas a month.    

Roman owns a vehicle that he uses for both business and personal purposes. He is seeking a loan of 3,000 Grivnyas to do much needed repairs of the vehicle. The family has had the car for awhile and now it needs some repair work. Roman can be characterized as a focused businessman and a wise steward of his finances.

loans.use: To do repairs on his vehicle

loans.name: Unidos Por El Triunfo Group

texts.es: Hersilia  tiene 60 años D. edad es socia D. la Alcancía Comunal Unidos por el Triunfo desD. hace tres años. Ella se dedica a elaborar manualidades como son bolsos en macramé, muñecas y también hace un poco D. costura, todos estos objetos los ofrece ella misma, además D. saber tejidos en macramé está estudiando manualidades en cuero para lo cual solicito un préstamo a EDAPROSPO e invertir en materiales para elaborar carteras en cuero. El sueño  D. Hersilia es que su último hijo termine la universidad y terminar D. construir su casa.
texts.en: Hersilia is 60 years old.  She has been a member of the 'Unidos por el Triunfo' (United for Victory) community bank for three years.  She makes handicrafts such as macramé bags, dolls and she also does a little sewing.  She sells all of these objects herself.  As well as knowing how to make macramé products, she is also studying how to make leather handicrafts.  She is requesting a loan from EDAPROSPO to invest in buying materials for making leather purses.  Hersilia's dream is for her youngest child to finish university and to finish building her house.

loans.use: Material (leather) for making purses

loans.name: Haydee Crisabel

texts.es: Haydee Crisabel A. C. es una persona muy esforzada, quien trabaja muy duro por el bienestar de su única hija de 5 años de edad, Haydee vive junto a ella en el municipio de Sensuntepeque en el departamento de Cabañas. Haydee se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños, y adultos, la cual comercializa en el mercado regional de Sensuntepeque, un mercado bastante grande que cuenta con una gran afluencia de personas. Ella es una madre de familia muy esforzada quien desea mucho que si hija tenga una vida mejor, razón por la que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual cuente con el dinero necesario para invertir en más ropa y de esta manera aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Haydee Crisabel A. C. is a very hard-working person who works hard for the well-being of her only daughter who is 5 years old.  She lives with her daughter in the town of Sensuntepeque, in Cabañas department.

Haydee sells children's and adults' clothes in Sensuntepeque regional market.  This is a large and very busy market.  Haydee is a very hard-working mother who wishes very much for her daughter to enjoy a better life.  She is requesting this loan so that she will have the money she needs to invest in buying more clothes so that she can increase her sales.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell

loans.name: María Elia

texts.es: María Elia F., reside en el municipio de Sensuntepeque en el departamento de Cabañas, lugar en el cual vive junto a su hijo de 9 años de edad. María es madre soltera, por lo que trabaja el doble para poder sostener su hogar y a su hijo. Ella se dedica a vender ropa, en su propio negocio el cual esta ubicado en el mercado de Sensuntepeque en donde posee un negocio bastante grande y surtido. María solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa, en diferentes tallas y colores, esto lo hace con el deseo de poder obtener mayor cantidad de clientes y así percibir más ganancias, lo cual es muy importante para ella, debido a que es la única fuente de ingresos que posee para sostener su hogar.
texts.en:
María Elia F. lives in the town of Sensuntepeque, in Cabañas department together with her 9 year-old son.  María is a single mother which means that she works doubly hard to support her household and her son.  She sells clothes in her own business which is located in Sensuntepeque market.  Her business is quite large and well stocked.

María is requesting a loan so that she can buy a larger quantity of clothes, in different sizes and colors.  This way, she hopes to be able to attract more customers and thereby make more profits.  This is very important to her since her business is the only source of income that she has with which to support her household.

loans.use: To buy clothes wholesale

loans.name: María Clementina

texts.es: María Clementina B., es una joven madre de un pequeño de 8 años de edad, con quien vive en Sensuntepeque, departamento de Cabañas, así mismo vive junto a su madre la cual le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. María posee una cafetería en la que comercializa productos alimenticios como: desayunos y almuerzos, así mismo vende bebidas y golosinas, su negocio se encuentra en el punto de microbuses de la ruta 12, en donde comercializa sus productos con motoristas y usuarios del transporte público. María desea aumentar la cantidad de productos para comercializar, y así de esta manera aumentar sus ventas lo cual es su principal objetivo.
texts.en: María Clementina B. is the young mother of an 8 year old.  She lives in Sensuntepeque, in Cabañas department, with her mother who helps her with the household expenses.  María owns a café in which she sells food such as breakfasts and lunches.  She also sells soft drinks and candy.  Her business is located at the bus stop for route 12 minibuses.  She sells her products to motorists and public transport users.  María would like to increase the quantity of products she sells and thereby increase her sales which is her main goal.

loans.use: To buy perishables to sell

loans.name: María Gloria Ascensión

texts.es: María Gloria Ascensión P. D. de 43 años, vive junto a sus tres hijos y una sobrina, junto a los cuales reside en el municipio de Sensuntepeque. María posee una venta de productos plásticos, ropa interior, y en esta temporada también surte su negocio con productos navideños. María es una persona muy responsable en su hogar ya que es la única que trabaja por sostenerlo, ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de plásticos como: depósitos para el agua, botellas, platos y otros más, los cuales se venden durante todo el año. De esta manera ella espera mejorar sus ganancias y darles  una vida mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en: María Gloria Ascensión P. D. is 43 years old.  She lives together with her three children and a niece in the town of Sensuntepeque.  María has a business selling plastic products, underwear and, during the current season, she also stocks her business with Christmas products.  María is a very responsible person within her household as she is the only one who works to support it.  She is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of plastic products such as: water containers, bottles, plates and other products.  She sells these products all year round.  In this way, she hopes to improve her profits and provide her children with a better life.

loans.use: To buy plastic products to sell

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es: La  señora Gregoria C.  O. se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno hace tres años atrás , tiene tres vacas de las cuales  ella se ocupa de cuidarlas , alimentarlas, su esposo trabaja de albañil por su zona, ellos logran verse solamente en las noches ya que todo el día esta fuera y tiene poco tiempo para poder  ver a sus hijos que son 2 pequeños que aún no van a la escuela , estos señores  tienen bajos recursos, viven en una casa muy precaria, en la zona de Sipe Sipe a casi 22 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba;  ellos solicitaron un crédito y  poder comprar una vaca lechera , que les dará la posibilidad de tener un poco más de ingresos para la alimentación de sus hijos y la posibilidad de hacer crecer su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Gregoria C. O. has been raising cattle for three years.  She has three cows which she looks after and feeds.  Her husband works as a construction worker in the area.  They only get to see each other at night since he is out of the house all day and has little time to see their two small children who are not in school yet.

This is a family of few economic means.  They live in a very poorly-built house in Sipe Sipe, almost 22km from the city of Cochabamba.  They are requesting a loan so that they can buy a dairy cow which will give them the possibility to make a little more income with which they can feed their children.  It will also give them the possibility to grow their working capital.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: José Humberto

texts.es:
José Humberto  C. P. tiene 36 años. Es soltero, vive con los padres y con los hermanos, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. No tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS DEL GRAN PODER, Comunidad de San Ramón esta ubicada en el cantón Chillanes, a 35 minutos de la Oficina en Chillanes, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican exclusivamente a la agricultura.

José se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y fréjol. Las compras y ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes en la feria de los días Domingos.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para que la producción sea de calidad. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener terrenos propios.

Le gusta salir a pasear.
texts.en:
José Humberto C. P. is 36 years old.  He is single and lives with his parents and siblings in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.  He doesn't have any children.

The members of the Jesús del Gran Poder community bank, San Ramón community, is located in Chillanes canton, 35 minutes from our Chillanes office.  The members of the group work exclusively in farming.

José is a farmer.  He grows corn and beans.  He makes both his purchases and his sales in Chillanes canton, in the Sunday market.

José is requesting a loan to buy seeds, manure and fertilizers to ensure the quality of his crops.  The support of this loan will help him to cover his needs financially.  He faces challenges such as plant diseases, illnesses and changes in the weather.  His dream is to own his own land.  José likes to go out for walks.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Jessica Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jessica de 34 años, ella vende productos de uso personal como cosméticos por catalogo de marca Avon (empresa que ayuda a mujeres emprendedoras a vender cosméticos a un bajo costo) y Esika. 

Viviendo en zona periurbana llamada Paraíso inicio con las ventas de cosméticos Avon para tener ingresos suficientes y así dales una mejor vida a sus dos hijos de 12 y 8 años. Vende maquillaje, perfumes, cremas, desodorantes a un bajo costo por catalogo. Ella vende los productos a sus conocidos y vecinos. También con ayuda de su esposo vende comida los fines de semana para asegurar el futuro de sus hijos. 

Para incrementar su mercadería ella quiere comprar con el préstamo perfumes, maquillaje, cremas para su negocio. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa ya que una parte es de caña.
texts.en:
Jessica is 34 years old.  She sells Avon-branded personal products such as cosmetics through a catalog (Avon is a company that helps enterprising women to sell cosmetics at a low cost).  She also sells Esika-branded products.

Jessica lives in a peri-urban area called Paraíso.  She started selling Avon cosmetics so that she would have enough income with which to provide her two children, aged 12 and 8, with a better life.  She sells make up, perfume, creams and deodorants through a catalog at a low cost.  She sells her products to acquaintances and neighbors.  With her husband's help, Jessica also sells food at weekends to guarantee her children's future.

To increase her merchandise, Jessica would like to use her loan to buy perfumes, make up and creams for her business.  In the future, she would like to finish building her house since part of it is made from cane.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, perfumes and creams

loans.name: Hector Anibal

texts.es: El señor Héctor Martínez B. es un joven comerciante que vive en el municipio del Carmen de Bolívar, al norte de Colombia. El, desde muy niño, ayudaba a su madre en el oficio de tendero y, ante la reciente e intempestiva muerte de ella, debió hacerse cargo del negocio. Héctor, a pesar de vivir en una localidad eminentemente agrícola y productora de artesanías, optó por dedicarse a la venta de víveres. La mayoría de sus clientes son campesinos que viven en veredas cercanas y hacen compras cada semana. Casi todas las ventas las realiza de contado y esto le permite ofrecer precios más bajos. El promedio de ventas diarias es de $ 400.000 COP y el margen promedio de utilidad es del 15%. Este es su primer préstamo con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y  planea invertirlo en la compra de víveres al por mayor. En un futuro próximo, el microempresario planea convertir su negocio en un autoservicio para mayor comodidad de sus clientes. El combina el trabajo con el estudio y por ser el hermano mayor, les inculca a sus hermanos la necesidad de capacitarse para ser ciudadanos de bien. Lo que más le gusta a Héctor de su trabajo es el contacto permanente con las personas que visitan su negocio, algunas de las cuales son buenos amigos. Sueña con ser un profesional y poder ayudar a los niños más pobres de su localidad en honor a la memoria de su madre, quien siempre se distinguió por ser una dama generosa.
texts.en:
Héctor Martínez B. is a young salesman who lives in the town of Carmen del Bolívar, in the north of Colombia.  Since he was a young boy he helped his mother in her work as a shopkeeper.  Faced with her recent and untimely death, he had to take over her business.

In spite of the fact that he lives in an area which is mainly made up of farmers and craftspeople, Héctor decided to work selling foodstuffs.  Most of his customers are peasants who work in nearby districts and do their shopping every week.  Almost all his sales are made for cash and this allows him to sell at lowers prices.  His average daily sales amount to 400,000 Colombian pesos and his average profit margin is 15%.

This is Héctor's first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and he plans to invest the money in buying foodstuffs wholesale.  In the not-so-distant future this small businessman plans to convert his business into a supermarket to provide his customers with more convenience.  Héctor combines his work with his studies and, because he is the eldest brother, he drives home to his siblings the need for them to get training in order to become good citizens.

What Héctor likes most about his work is the permanent contact with people who visit his business, some of whom are good friends.  He dreams of becoming a professional and being able to help the poorest children in his town as a way of honoring his mother's memory as his mother was a very generous lady.

loans.use: To buy foodstuffs wholesale

loans.name: Mariateresa

texts.es: La Sra. María Teresa tiene 34 años de edad tiene 3 hijos bajo su dependencia, ellos estudian en la escuela de su zona, La Sra.  Maria Teresa es madre soltera porque su esposo la dejó por otra mujer mucho más joven que ella, y su ex esposo no pasa pensiones, además que el lugar donde ellos viven es una casa muy rústica en condiciones no muy habitables para vivir. Quiere mejorar su forma de vida y para ello, solicita un crédito para aumentar el ganado vacuno que le genera ingresos al producir leche y al cual se dedica con mucho sacrificio ya que necesita aumentar sus ingresos comprando otra vaca.
texts.en:
María Teresa is 34 years old and has three children in her care who are all studying in the local school.  Maria Teresa is a single mother because her husband left her for another, much younger, woman.  Her ex-husband doesn't provide them with maintenance.

María Teresa and her family live in a very basic house which isn't in particularly habitable conditions.  She would like to improve her way of life and, for this reason, she is requesting a loan to increase her dairy herd which provide her with income through the milk that they produce.  María Teresa works hard in her business.  She needs to increase her income by buying another cow.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es: El Sr. Gutiérrez es un hombre muy trabajador y humilde, empezó a trabajar desde muy temprana edad ayudándole a su papa en trabajos de construcción, al formar su propia familia siguió con el mismo oficio, con ese trabajo empezó a levantar su casa, y a comprar maquinaria para instalar una vulcanizadora siempre pensando en el futuro poner su propio negocio en este momento lo a conseguido tiene su negocio el cual lo trabaja su hijo cuando el esta trabajando en su oficio de albañil, el negocio le funciona bien tiene 15 años de haber empezado con el mismo y ya es un negocio estable el requiere el dinero para comprar material que necesita en su vulcanizadora y llantas las cuales compra en buen estado par revenderlas.
