In the afternoons, she displays her products in nearby towns which has helped her to increase her customer base.  She provides her customers with credit facilities.  María's activities support her household financially, together with the money her husband makes from his work.  In the evenings, María studies

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Jhojan Antonio

texts.es: El Joven Jhojan se dedica a la compra y venta de tarjetas para recarga de crédito para celulares,  ya cuenta con clientela pero debido a que encontró mas clientela el capital con que esta trabajando ya no le es suficiente motivo por el cual solicita el crédito para incrementar su capital de trabajo, se dedica a esta actividad hace un  año durante el cual ya pudo acumular un buen capital, jhojan es soltero y se solventa sus estudios con la venta de tarjetas,  aun vive en domicilio de propiedad de sus padres quienes ven con agrado que su hijo aun continúe estudiando pese al trabajo que implica la venta de las tarjetas, el joven esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Young Jhojan buys and sells pre-paid cell phone cards.  He already has a regular customer base but he has attracted more customers which means that the capital with which he is working isn't enough.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to increase his working capital.  He has been in this business for one year during which time he has made good money.

Jhojan is single and covering his studies with his card sales business.  He still lives in his parents' home.  His parents are very happy that their son is continuing with his studies in spite of the work that his card sales business entails.  He is very grateful to the institution for the support he is receiving.

loans.use: Working capital to buy phone cards

loans.name: Maria Cleofe

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Maria; ella tiene 46 años. La socia es soltera, y tiene 01 hijo; la socia se dedica a la administración de su tienda de abarrotes ella desea implementar el dinero y comprar mercadería para surtir su tienda, ella también deberá terminar de pagar parte de la mercadería que adquirió en el mes de noviembre como panetones, vinos, champan, chocolates para la época navideña, actualmente la socia nos indica que le está yendo muy bien que está vendiendo sus panetones y las pastas de chocolate, ella tiene buenas expectativas con respecto a la época navideña y el año nuevo, la socia nos indica que el año pasado vendió panetones hasta el mes de marzo de este año entonces no se apura en vender todos solo en esta fecha. La socia solicita el préstamo para surtir mercadería y pagar una última cuota de los panetones.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the "Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco" community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Maria is 46 years old.  She is single and has one child.  Her business is running her grocery store.  She would like to use her loan money to buy merchandise so that she can stock her store.  She must also finish paying for some of the merchandise that she acquired in the month of November such as panettones, wine, champagne and chocolates for the Christmas season.

Maria tells us that currently her business is doing very well and that she is managing to sell her panettones and chocolates.  She is confident with respect to the Christmas season and the New Year.  She tells us that last year she sold panettones up until the month of March so she is not worried about selling them all right now.

Maria is requesting this loan to stock her store with merchandise and to meet the last repayment on her panettone purchase.  She is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To stock her store with merchandise and to make her final repayment on her panettone purchase

loans.name: Sonya

texts.en:
Sonya S. was a math teacher. She is a mother and grandmother of three. Because a teacher’s salary in Armenia is extremely low, Sonya had to undertake a trade to help her family survive after her husband’s death. Sonya sells women’s clothing. She understands her clients’ demands and always tries to satisfy their needs. 

She has applied for a loan to bring in new inventory which will be very popular for the holiday celebrations. Her daughter-in law will be helping her during this busy season and, in the future, when Sonya expands her business.

loans.use: To buy new clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase nail polish, cotton balls, nail clippers, polish remover and medicinals for foot pain for her manicure and pedicure business.

loans.name: Dedevi Ahoefa

texts.fr: Elle est âgée de 32 ans et mère de 2 enfants. Elle est mariée et exerce comme activité génératrice de revenus la vente de bijoux. Elle compte dans cette activité 9 ans d’expérience. Elle s’approvisionne au Ghana à Accra et au Benin à Cotonou et revient vendre au grand marché de Lomé. Elle demande un crédit pour répondre à la demande sans cesse croissante.
texts.en:
She is 32 years old and the mother of 2 children. She is married and sells jewelry in order to earn a living. She has 9 years of experience in this business. 

She stocks up at Accra in Ghana and at Cotonou in Benin and then sells at the big market in Lomé. 

She is requesting a loan to meet ever-increasing customer demand.

loans.use: To purchase jewelry

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Sonia; ella tiene 39 años. La socia es casada, y tiene 02 hijos; la socia se dedica al comercio minorista, la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de frutas, ella trae fruta desde Quillabamab al por mayor y reparte en Cusco. La socia desea el dinero ahora para invertir en su carrito ella tiene junto a su esposo un auto y desea invertir l crédito en la compra de llantas nuevas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de llantas nuevas para su carro.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Introducing Sonia, a member of the Banco Comunal “Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco” (“Cusco’s New Awakening” Communal Bank), that is located in the Huanchac district of the Cusco province.

Sonia is 39 years old, she is married and she has 2 children. She engages in the retail sector, buying and selling fruit: she buys fruit at wholesale price in Quillabamba that she then sells in Cusco. The loan she is now requesting will be used to invest in her vehicle. Together with her husband she owns a car and she want to use the loan to buy new tires. Sonia is asking for a loan to buy new tires for her car. 

Sonia is happy with the loan she has been granted and she commits to complying with the repayment of her dues at the set deadlines.

loans.use: To buy new tires for her car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sewing needles, fabric and thread

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es: La señora Rosalía se dedica al venta de carne de pollo desde hace cuatro años en puesto propio del mercado, trabaja de lunes a domingo, solicita el crédito ya que desea comprar una conservadora mas grande que la que tiene ya que sus ventas se han incrementado y a veces ya no puede almacenar su mercadería, tiene una niña que depende completamente de ella ya que el padre de su hijita la abandono, vive en casa de propiedad de su madre quien se encuentra en el exterior, es una joven muy trabajadora, esta y responsable, desea lo mejor para su hija por eso le dedica también gran parte de su tiempo sin descuidar el trabajo y la educación de su hija, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Rosalía has dedicated herself to selling poultry for the past four years.  She has her own site at the market, and works from Monday to Sunday.  She requests the loan in order to buy a larger cooler, since her sales are growing and sometimes she doesn’t have enough room to store her products.  

She has a daughter who depends entirely on her, since the father abandoned them. Rosalía  lives in a house owned by her mother, who is currently abroad.  She is a hard-working and dependable young woman, who only wants the very best for her daughter.  For this reason, she dedicates a great deal of time to her business and to her daughter’s education.  She is thankful to the institution for their support.

loans.use: To purchase a cooler and merchandise.

loans.name: Honorata

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Huanchac en la provincia y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Honorata; ella tiene 50 años. La socia es soltera; la socia se dedica a la atención D. su tienda D. abarrotes, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en la planta baja D. su vivienda, la socia desea implementar y pagara al proveedor D. la compra D. panetones que adquirió el mes pasado y comprar mercadería para el año entrante. La socia solicita comprar productos básicos para el año entrante ella compraría, arroz en bolsas grandes, azúcar al por mayor, aceites en bidones. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la adquisición D. mercadería para el año entrante.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “NEW DAWN OF CUSCO” cooperative bank, which is located in the Huanchac district of the province of Cusco.

Her name is Honorata, and she is 50 years old and single.  She dedicates herself to tending to her general store, located in the lower level of her home.  She wants to supply her store, pay the vendor from whom she bought fruitcakes last month, and also buy some merchandise for the coming year.

Honorata would like to buy basic products for next year, such as large sacks of rice, sugar at wholesale and drums of cooking oil.  The member requests the loan to buy more products.

She is very happy with the loan granted, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for the coming year.

loans.name: Amavi Mawussenam

texts.fr: Amavi est âgée de 23 ans. Elle gère comme activité de revenus, la vente de  bijoux et cumule 6 ans dans  cette activité.  Elle s’approvisionne au Ghana à Accra et  au Benin à Cotonou et revient vendre au marché d’adawlato. Elle est née à Lomé et habite quartier Bè. L’objet de ce crédit sera essentiellement destiné à l’achat de 10 douzaines de Bracelet, 5 douzaines de boucle d’oreille et 20 boites à bijoux.
texts.en:
Amavi is 23 years old. In order to earn a living, she runs a jewelry business. She has 6 years of experience in this activity. 

She gets her supplies from Accra in Ghana and from Cotonou in Benin and then sells them at the Adawlato market. 

She was born in Lomé and lives in the Bè district. The main purpose of this loan is to purchase 10 dozens of bracelets, 5 dozens of earrings and 20 jewelry boxes.

loans.use: To purchase jewelry

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: God's Grace Kikaaya-Kampala Group

texts.en:
26-year-old Rachael N. belongs to God's Grace Kikaaye Group-Kampala. For the past 4 years, she has been selling electronics in Kanyanya. The jolly and amiable Rachael says she bought the business from a close friend who wanted to move onto something else. Prior to that, she was running a second-hand clothing business. 

In many ways, the savings from this business enabled her take root. In the near future, she wants to open wider market horizons for her business, but she says that, for now, her mind is set on equipping her business with the latest in electronics. The happily married mother of four says this business generates 300,000 shillings each month. She is requesting this loan to purchase more electronics to sell.

loans.use: To buy more electronics to sell

loans.name: Wiñay Huayna Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WIÑAY HUAYNA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa; ella tiene 54 años D. edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia se dedica a la venta D. bebidas como chicha D. quinua, agua D. manzana y chicha morada, ella tiene un pequeño puesto en el mercado D. Wanchaq que trabaja desD. las 10:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y por medio D. este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere tener un snack donD. pueda vender las bebidas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar las bebidas.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta D. ropa, venta D. artesanía, tienda D. abarrotes, venta D. carteras y venta D. tejidos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
These individuals belong to the “WIÑAY HUAYNA” cooperative bank, located in the district and province of Cusco.

The member is Rosa, who is 54 years old, single, and has one child.  She dedicates herself to selling beverages such as chicha D. quinua, apple juice, and chicha morada (chicha is a traditional Andean beverage, typically derived from maize).  

She has a site at the market in Wanchaq, where she works from 10:00 am until 5:00 pm.  By means of this small business, she helps her son get ahead.  She would like to have a snack stand where she could sell the beverages.  She is requesting a loan to buy the ingredients for making her refreshments.

The other members dedicate themselves to selling clothing, handicrafts, handbags, and knitted goods, and some have general stores.

She is happy about the loan, and commits to making her payments.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients for making her beverages.

loans.name: Wilson Richard

texts.es: El señor Wilson dedicado a la compra y venta de repuestos para vehículo esta actividad lo realiza ya hace 3 años atrás siendo este su ingreso para mantener a sus pequeños y a su querida esposa la que en algunas oportunidades ayuda a la economía de la familia, dedicándose a  la venta de refrescos y otras bebidas, este crédito ayudara mucho a esta familia para agrandar su negocio ya que el Sr. Wilson desea comprar repuestos de vehículo por cantidad para así surtir su negocio es un apersona joven y muy trabajadora esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Wilson is dedicated to buying and selling replacement parts for vehicles, an activity he has been involved in for 3 years.  This is the means by which he supports his children and his beloved wife, who also tries to help the family financially when able by selling refreshments and other beverages.

The loan will help this family a great deal, by allowing him to expand his enterprise.  Wilson would like to buy replacement parts in bulk to supply his business.  He is a very hard-working young man, and gives thanks to the institution for the support it provides.

loans.use: Working capital to buy vehicle replacement parts.

loans.name: Dorymar

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Dorymar; ella tiene 32 años. La socia es soltera; la socia se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, la socia trabaja vendiendo  productos de belleza por catálogos y manifiesta que  le va muy bien, ella ha ido ahorrando todos sus ingresos y junto a cada préstamo a logrado comprar sus cosas y ahora sus padres le han dado un terreno para que ella lo pueda construir y hacer un pequeño mini departamento, la socia empezó con los muros y ha logrado ya poner la base ahora ella desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas, ella dice que no es fácil hacerlo todo en una sola, puesto que se necesita mucha inversión pero que poco a poco lo está logrando. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “NEW DAWN OF CUSCO” cooperative bank, located in the Huanchac district of the province of Cusco.

Her name is Dorymar; she is 32 years old and single.  She dedicates herself to selling cosmetics by catalog, and states that things are going very well.  She has been saving all her earnings and, together with each loan, has managed to buy her merchandise.  

Now, her parents have given her some land to construct a small building.  She has started with the walls and managed to put in a foundation, and requests the loan to buy doors and windows.  She tells us it’s not an easy task to do all at once, given it requires a good deal of investment, but she is managing little by little.  She requests the loan for the purchase of doors and windows.

She is very happy for the loan, and commits to making her payments within the established time frame.

loans.use: To invest in the purchase of doors and windows.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Doña Rosa, resiD. en Concepción  Batres, departamento D. Usulután, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 14, 12 y 8 años D. edad, se dedica a vender ropa y medicina, tiene 44 años D. edad, el negocio lo atienD. con sus hijos quienes le ayudan a salir a vender, este negocio fue iniciativa propia debido a la necesidad D. trabajar, no tiene un horario fijo y actualmente necesita D. un préstamo para comprar mercadería para salir a vender D. forma ambulante.
Con este préstamo quiere comprar medicamentos y prendas D. vestir, su propósito es darle continuidad al negocio invirtiéndole cada que hay oportunidad para mantenerse activa con un trabajo que genere ingresos para su hogar y sobre todo para cubra gastos necesarios que enfrenta el hogar.
Su objetivo con el préstamo es realizar una buena inversión, cancelar sus cuotas a tiempo, crecer con el negocio y mejorar las condiciones D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in Concepción Batres, located in the department of Usulután, with her husband and three children ages 14, 12 and 8.  She dedicates herself to selling clothing and medicine.  She is 44 years old.  She tends to her business with the help of her children, who help her travel around selling her products.  She started the business on her own initiative, given the need for her to find work.  She does not have a fixed schedule, and currently needs a loan to buy merchandise to sell door-to-door.

She would like to use the loan to buy medicines and clothing.  Her plan is to give her business continuity by investing in it every chance she has.  She wants to keep active in a line of work that generates income for the home and, most of all, to cover the household’s expenses.  

Her objectives with regard to this loan are to make a good investment, to make her payments on time, to grow the business and to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase medicines and clothing.

loans.name: Silvestre

texts.es: El señor Silvestre dedicado al servicio de transporte hace ya un año a atrás, hasta el momento solo pudo ahorrar el 15% para la compra de un línea de ruta, este crédito le servirá para poder completar en monto requerido para esta y así poder trabajar de manera segura, el señor es el que mantiene toda la familia con este ingreso ya que su esposa solo se dedica a cuidar a sus hijos, este crédito servirá a esta familia para mejorar su calidad de vida ya que incrementara sus ingresos, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: For the past year, Silvestre has dedicated himself to providing transportation services.  Up until now, he has only been able to save 15% toward the total amount he needs to buy a route line.  This loan will help him be able to gather the total funds required to do this, so that he can secure his work.  He alone supports his entire family with this income, given that his wife cares for their children.  This loan will help the family improve their standard of living, since it will increase his income.  He is very thankful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To purchase a route line.

loans.name: Awatiñas Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “Awatiñas” está iniciando su ciclo número uno en el Centro Focal de Villa Tejada. Cuenta con nueve integrantes.  Los negocios de las señoras están relacionados con el comercio, producción  y servicio, entre estos tenemos: servicio de lavandería, venta de ropa de bebé, ayudante de albañil, lavado de arena, venta de abarrotes, venta de comida, tejidos de mantas, venta de tennis (zapatos deportivos)

La mesa directiva está compuesta por la presidenta, la señora Maria Elena, la tesorera, la señora Margarita y como secretaria de actas la señora Sonia. Muchas de las señoras indican que ya tiene experiencia en trabajar con crédito, fueron socias de Pro Mujer durante algunos años y que lo dejaron porque ya no necesitaban, ahora se han visto en la necesidad de contar con un capital para impulsar el negocio o para renovar las herramientas de trabajo.  Este es el caso del la señora María Elena Q., presidenta de la Banca Comunal “Awatiñas”, fue socia durante diez y ocho ciclos. Su negocio es el lavado de arena, ella cuenta que por la zona donde vive pasa un río que trae arena en la época de lluvia.  Ella y algunas otras personas del vecindario hicieron los trámites para que se dieran lugares para lavar la arena a orillas del río. La señora Maria Elena le llama “puesto”, así como un puesto de venta de verduras.   Este es un trabajo pesado, pero rentable.  El crédito de la señora presidenta es de Bs 2000.- y con el mismo ella piensa comprar carretilla, pala, manguera, trinche, picota, manguera, herramientas que necesita por que las que tiene están muy desgastadas.
Cuando se le consulta sobre lo que más le gusta de Pro Mujer, la respuesta es “el crédito”.
texts.en:
The Awatiñas Community Bank is starting its first loan cycle in the Villa Tejada Centre. There are nine women in the group, and all have businesses in commerce, production, or service such as a laundry, baby clothing sales, builder’s assistant, sand washing, grocery sales, food sales, weaving shawls, or selling sports footwear.

Sra. Maria Elena is president of the Board of Directors, Sra. Margarita is treasurer, and Sra. Sonia is secretary. Many of the women note that they already have experience taking out loans as they have been members of Kiva partner Pro Mujer for several years. They stopped when they no longer needed financial assistance, but now they have seen the need for money to give a boost to their businesses or to buy some new tools.

Such is the case with Señora María Elena Q., president of the Awatiñas Community Bank, who has been a member for eighteen loan cycles. Her job is washing sand. She explains that a river runs through the area where she lives. During the rainy season it carries a lot of sand. María and several other people from the neighbourhood have permits for certain locations on the banks of the river where they can wash the sand. María calls her location a ‘stand’, just as if it were a stand for selling vegetables. It’s hard work but profitable. Her loan of Bs 2000 will be used to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, hosepipe, fork, and a pickaxe--tools she needs as the ones she owns are worn out. When María is asked what she most likes about Pro Mujer, she replies “the financial assistance”.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, shovel, hosepipe, fork, and a pickaxe

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, de 22 años  de edad, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre y dos hermanos, está soltera y no tiene hijos, en su hogar todos trabajan y aportan para cubrir los gastos diarios, por su parte administra una  tienda, que logro instalar por la ayuda de su madre, no tiene un horario fijo; por el momento su dificultad es que no cuenta con dinero para reinvertir en mercadería.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como detergentes, productos alimenticios como pastas, arroz, frijol, salsas, entre otros que son parte del inventario de su negocio, con esta ayuda estará fortaleciendo la tienda para atender de una mejor manera a los clientes.
Sueña con tener un negocio amplio, surtido en mercadería, con mucha demanda y formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
22-year old Anaa lives in El Transito, in the department of San Miguel, with her mother and two siblings. She is single and doesn’t have any children. Everyone in the household has a job and contributes to daily expenses.

Ana runs a store which she started with help from her mother. She doesn’t have a fixed schedule. The problem she has at the moment is a lack of money to buy merchandise, so she is seeking a loan for this purpose. She wishes to buy detergent, and food items like pasta, rice, beans, sauces etc. With this financial help Ana will be improving the store and providing a better service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy detergent, pasta, rice, beans, sauces

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San  Miguel, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de6, 3 y 2 años de edad, tiene 35 años de edad, se dedica a la carpintería, este taller lo inicio gracias a la ayuda de un amigo, para quien él trabajaba pues aprendió bien el oficio y decidió independizase, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00am a 4:00 pm, su ventaja es que ha logrado ganar muchos clientes aparte de que cuenta con experiencia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para trabajar, materiales como madera de distintas clases de arboles, clavos, pintura y sellador, este préstamo le ayudara a contar con suficiente material para realizar trabajos que han encargado sus clientes, también estará brindando un mejor trabajo y servicio.
Una de sus aspiraciones es tener un taller amplio, tener maquinaria en buen estado y mantener una buena cantidad de clientes satisfechos con su buen trabajo.
texts.en:
Jorge lives in San Miguel, in the department of the same name, with his wife and three children aged 6, 3, and 2. He is 35 years old and a carpenter. He started his workshop with help from a friend with whom he used to work. He learned the trade well and decided to open his own business working from 8am to 4pm. Jorge has the advantage of many customers as well as years of experience.

He is seeking a loan to buy materials such as different types of wood, nails, paint, and sealer. The money will help him to have sufficient material to complete the orders he already has, as well as provide better work and service. One of Jorge’s goals is to have a well-equipped workshop with quality equipment and a large number of satisfied customers.

loans.use: to buy materials for his carpentry business

loans.name: Margoth Eliza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Margoth; ella tiene 29 años. La socia es soltera; la socia tiene 01 hijo, y es el que está en la foto con ella en la reunión de equipo; la socia se dedica a la venta de pollipapas (trae un octavo de pollo frito acompañado de papas fritas y salsas al gusto del cliente) y salchipapas, (salchichas doradas acompañadas con papas fritas) ella también tiene su pequeña tienda de abarrotes, y acondicionó un pequeño carrito de frituras y a partir de las 6:00 p.m. la socia trabaja vendiendo sus pollipapas y salchipapas mientras que su tienda es atendida por su mamá, la socia desea incrementar sus insumos y comprar pollos para esta temporada al por mayor ya que a empezado a tener mucha clientela , también deberá comprar combustible para su cocina a gas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para su negocio y combustible.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Margoth belongs to the “Nuevo Amanecer del Cusco” (New Dawn of Cusco) Communal Bank, located in the Huanchac district of the province and department of Cusco. She is 29 years old, single, and has 1 child. (He is seen in her photo taken at the group's reunion.) Margoth sells 'pollipapas' (1/8th of a fried chicken with potatoes in a sauce of the customer's choice). She also has a small grocery store plus a little cart selling fried food. After 6:00 pm, Margoth sells her 'pollipapas' and 'salchipapas' (similar to the former but with sausage) while her mother attends the store.

Margoth wants to expand her supplies and buy chickens for this season at wholesale, since she has begun to acquire a larger customer base. Also, she needs to buy fuel for her gas kitchen. Therefore, Margoth is soliciting a loan to purchase supplies and gas for her business.

Margoth is happy with the loan offered and promises to comply with her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: TO BUY INGREDIENTS AND COOKING GAS FOR HER POPULAR MEAL VENDING BUSINESS

loans.name: James Ngugi

texts.en:
For three years, James has been raising poultry and rabbits to sell as a primary business. He also owns rental houses. James earns a monthly income of Kshs.20 000.  He is married to Nancy, who is also a businesswoman, and together they have four school-going children.

He has never borrowed from any other MFI. He is applying for his first loan of Kshs.30,000 from KADET LTD. He intends to buy a new breed of poultry to raise and sell and also to buy rabbit feed. With the anticipated profit, he plans to expand his poultry farm and eventually build more rental houses.

In the future, James hopes to educate his children to university level.

loans.use: To buy rabbit feed and a new breed of poultry to raise

loans.name: Melania

texts.es:
La Sra. Melania tiene una despensa y un kiosko  muy bien surtido en Coronel Oviedo, la misma es Madre y Padre  para tres hijos, la mayor tiene 22 años se llama Yeni Rosana y está siguiendo el tercer año de una carrera universitaria gracias al esfuerzo constante de su mama. 
La Sra. Melania también comenta que en la casa todos se ayudan, ella se levanta temprano y hace variadas clases de comidas rápidas para el Kiosko y su hija Rosana atiende en la despensa.
Esta muy agradecida con la entidad por haber confiado en su persona porque gracias al préstamo que le ha otorgado rápidamente la Fundación ya compro azúcar, harina, aceites, arroz, carne  y están trabajando tranquilamente ahora en su negocio con toda su familia.
texts.en:
Ms. Melania has a small well-stocked grocery store and a kiosk in Coronel Oviedo. She acts as mother and father to three children, the oldest is 22 year-old Yeni Rosana who is in her third year of university studies thanks to the constant effort of her mother. Ms. Melania also comments that at home everybody helps each other. She gets up early and makes various kinds of fast food for the kiosk and her daughter Rosana manages the small grocery store. 

She is very grateful to the organization for having confidence in her because thanks to this loan that the Foundation has granted her so quickly, she has already bought sugar, flour, oil, rice, and meat and is now calmly working in her business with her entire family.

loans.use: Buy merchandise such as noodles, oil, rice, meat and more.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es: El Sr. Raúl, vive en la casa de su madre el Sr. Es eléctrico tiene un taller eléctrico en la misma casa donde vive, el mantiene a su Mama, trabaja todos los días es muy conocido en la zona por el buen trabajo que realiza, el préstamo invertirá para la compra de repuestos herramientas para su taller, joven  soltero independiente con muchas ganas de salir adelante trabajador, con ganas de superación esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Raul is a single independent young man, eager to get ahead in his life. He lives with his mother, is electrician and runs a workshop in his house. He takes care of his mother, works every day of the week and is well known in the area for the good service he provides. He will invest the loan in the purchase of replacement tools. He is grateful to the institution for the support.

loans.use: Purchase of replacement tools

loans.name: Urpis De Confraternidad Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Damiana; ella tiene 65 años de edad y es viuda  y tiene 1 hijo; La socia se dedica al negocio de ferretería, ella vende diferentes materiales para la construcción de casas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio de ferretería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para la ferretería como clavos, tornillos entre otros.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta de ropa, venta de repuestos para bicicleta, restaurant, venta de comida y carpintería.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank URPIS DE CONFRATERNIDAD. This bank is located on the Cusco district belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Ms. Damiana. She is 65 years old, a widow, and has 1 child. The member has a hardware store where she sells various material for housing construction. The member works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and by means of this business the member is giving her children a good start in life. The member would like to improve and expand her hardware business. The member is requesting the loan to buy material for the hardware store such as nails and screws, amongst others.

The other members work in the sale of clothing, the sale of bicycle parts, restaurant, the sale of food and carpentry.

The member is happy for the loan and promises to adhere to the payment of her installments.

loans.use: The member requests this loan to buy material for a hardware store such as nails and screws, amongst others.

loans.name: Isabel Carolina

texts.es:
Isabel, es una joven de 22 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, es madre soltera de una niña llamada Rubí de un año de edad, no tiene casa propia por lo que alquila vivienda con una amiga. El negocio es la venta de ropa un hermano y su amiga le ayudan a vender, la situación económica le llevo a dedicarse a  este comercio, este negocio es el que le ayuda a salir con los gastos y necesidades diarias, realiza sus ventas en los pueblos cercanos. 
Ella necesita de un préstamo para invertirlo en mercadería ya que carece de recursos económicos para impulsar su negocio, su compra seria en ropa pues para esta temporada la demanda aumenta y quiere aprovechar para tener mejores ingresos.
Este préstamo le ayudara muchísimo ya que al realizar la inversión estará aumentando su inventario y ofreciendo a los clientes más productos con la ventaja que la ropa es un producto que en cualquier época se vende por lo que sus riesgos son mínimos. Su sueño es algún día tener su propia casa, crecer a su hija que es su principal motivación para seguir adelante luchado por mejorar el futuro, para tener una mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Isabel, age 22, sells clothes.  She lives in San Francisco Gotera in the Morazán department.  She is the single mother of a one year old daughter named Rubí.  She does not have her own house, so she rents a house with a friend.

Her business is selling clothes; a brother and her friend help her sell.  The economic situation drove her to dedicate herself to this trade.  This business is what helps her with the expenses and daily necessities.  She makes her sales in nearby towns.

She needs a loan to buy merchandise.  She does not have the financial resources to boost her business.  She will buy clothes as the demand increases during this season.  She wants to take advantage of that in order to get better earnings.

This loan will help her a great deal.  Upon making this investment, her inventory will  increase.  She will be selling more products to her customers.  She has the advantage that clothing is a product that sells in any season.  Therefore, her risks are minimal.

Her dream is to one day have her own house and to raise her daughter.  Her daughter is her primary motivation for fighting to improve the future and having a better financial situation.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Irma Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra: Irma; ella tiene 53 años. La socia es soltera y trabaja en ESALUD, ella es empleada pública en esta entidad, la socia desea el crédito para comprar unas pastillas porque debe iniciar su tratamiento contra la gastritis y el seguro no le proporciona las pastillas blandas para ella poder tomarlas, también deberá comprar otros medicamentos que no tiene el seguro social, la socia se mostro un poco triste al respecto y solo manifestó que desea hacer su tratamiento con medicamento de mejor calidad para que no le afecte a sus riñones ni a su ya agravada gastritis. La socia solicita el préstamo para iniciar su tratamiento.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Irma belongs to the “Nuevo Amanecer Del Cusco” (Cusco’s New Dawn) Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Huanchac district in the Cusco province and department.

Irma is 53 years old.  She is single, and she works at ESALUD (Health Social Security).  She is a public employee in this entity.  

She wants the loan to buy pills because she needs to start treatment for gastritis.  The insurance does not cover the soft gel tablets for her to be able to take them.  Also, she will need to buy other medications that the social security does not have.

She was a little sad about this, and she expressed that she only wants to have her treatment with the best quality medication.  She wants this so that her kidneys are not affected, and her gastritis is not aggravated.  She is requesting the loan to start her treatment.

She is happy with the loan that was granted, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To start her treatment

loans.name: Silvia Karina

texts.es:
Silvia de 30 años, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Fortín es madre soltera tiene tres hijos de 11, 8 y 4 años de edad que estudian en una escuela del gobierno (aparecen en la foto). Con dedicación ella ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo para darles una buena vida a sus hijos.       

Comenzó con la idea de tener su propio negocio hace tres años atrás pero no pudo realizar su negocio sino en este año hace 8 meses atrás. Poco a poco  pudo surtir más su pequeño puesto de venta de herramientas hasta convertirlo en una pequeña ferretería. Ahora trabaja desde las 11h00am hasta las 18h00pm vende cables, focos, balanzas, herramientas etc. 

Quiere darle un buen futuro a sus hijos por eso quiere continuar con su negocio comprando con el préstamo cables, pernos, herramientas. Una de sus metas es convertirse una distribuidora exclusiva en repuestos y herramientas de la costa.
texts.en:
Silvia, age 30, lives in a periurban zone named Fortín.  She is a single mother, and she has three children.  The children are 11, 8, and 4 years old.  They (appearing in the photo) attend a government school.  She has worked with dedication for a long time in order to give her children a good life.

Three years ago she started with the idea of having her own business.  She was not able to establish her business until eight months ago.  Little by little she was able to better stock the place where she was selling tools, and she turned it into a small hardware store.  She now works from 11:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  She sells cables, lights, scales, and tools, etc.

She wants to give her children a good future.  Therefore, she wants to continue her business.  She will use the loan to buy cables, bolts, and tools.  One of her goals is to become an exclusive distributor of replacement parts on the coast.

loans.use: To buy cables, bolts, and tools

loans.name: Donatha

texts.en: Donatha owns a business selling food crops. She is 36 years old and married with 4 children aged between 2 and 13 years old. Her husband works as a soldier. Donatha has been selling food crops for 10 years. She decided to request this loan to buy more peanuts, sorghum, wheat flour, millet and soybeans to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to increase her sales. She would like to be a supplier of these food crops in the future.

loans.use: to buy more food crops to sell

loans.name: Rosalina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosalina, tiene 28 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de pupusas y  tortillas, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, donde vive con su hija de ocho años de edad y su familia ya que es madre soltera, ella aprendió el negocio de su mamá, el negocio es propio, su horario es de 7:00am, este trabajo lo realiza por la necesidad de ayudar a su hija y darle lo que necesita para crecer sanamente y poder estudiar.
Rosalina está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima como maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, que son los materiales necesarios para hacer la venta,  este préstamo ayudara a mantener los niveles adecuados de materiales, además tendrá que producir más procurando aumentar la demanda en los clientes.
Sus sueños son salir adelante con el negocio, crecer y mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia, además darle la educación y el sostenimiento necesario a su hija.
texts.en:
Rosalina, age 28, sells “pupusas” (flatbread stuffed with meat, cheese, or vegetables) and tortillas.  She lives in San Francisco Gotera in the Morazán department.  She lives with her eight year old daughter and her family because she is a single mother.

She learned the business from her mother, and the business is her own.  Her schedule starts at 7:00 a.m.  She does this work out of the necessity.  She needs to help her daughter and give her what she needs in order to grow in a healthful way and to be able to go to school.

Rosalina is requesting a loan to buy ingredients like corn, fresh cheese, and “chicharrón” (fried pork rinds).  These are the ingredients she needs in order to make sales.  This loan will help her keep an adequate amount of ingredients.  Also, she will have to produce more as she tries to increase the customer demand.

Her dreams are to get ahead in the business, to grow and improve her quality of life and that of her family, and to give her daughter an education and the necessary support.

loans.use: To buy corn, fresh cheese, and chicharrón

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes López Benitez es comerciante, tiene su negocio sobre la avenida Ayolas, tiene un negocio muy bien surtido. Tiene muchísimos clientes porque tiene muy buena ubicación, trabaja desde hace 2 años en su negocio.
Es una señora  sacrificada y  luchadora, es madre soltera siempre soñó con tener su negocio propio para poder educar a su hija y mantener la casa .Con el préstamo obtenido ha comprado mas arroz, harina, aceites, lácteos, bebidas y así poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Agradece mucho a la Institución por haberle brindado la oportunidad de sacar adelante su negocio por medio del crédito ya que pudo comprar mercaderia para el negocio como fideos, panificados, arroz y otros.
texts.en:
Mercedes López Benitez is a merchant.  She has a very well stocked store on Ayolas Avenue.  She has a lot of customers because she has a very good location.  She has been working in her business for two years.  She is a selfless and tenacious woman.  She is a single mother, and she has always dreamed of having her own business in order to raise her daughter and maintain the house.

With the loan she got she bought more rice, flour, oil, dairy products, and drinks.  She did this to be able to provide her customers with better service.

She is very grateful to the institution for having provided the opportunity to get ahead in her business via the loan.  She was able to buy merchandise like noodles, baked goods, rice, and other products for her business.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, noodles, baked goods, and other products

loans.name: Sacaba Group

texts.es: La representante del grupo es la Sra. Roxana es la líder del grupo vive en la zona de villa obrajes vive en la casa de sus padres es joven independiente  tiene una tienda de barrio también realiza el preparado de tucumanas, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de mercadería para surtir su  tienda, comprara refrescos, galletas y dulces, etc.  es grupo de personas jóvenes con actividad económica independiente , el préstamo lo invertirán para incrementar su capital con la compra de mercadería, están agradecidas con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Roxana is the representative and the leader of this group. She lives with her parents in Villa Obrajes, a neighborhood of La Paz. She is an independent young woman and runs a corner shop in her neighborhood, where she also bakes tucumanas, a tipical pastry. She will use her loan to buy merchandise to stock in her store, like sodas, biscuits, candies, etc. This is a group of young people with independent business activities and the loan will be invested to increase the operating capital and to buy merchandise; they are grateful to the institution for the support granted through this loan.

loans.use: Purchase of stock merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, and the rental of a yolk to remove earth.

loans.name: Silvia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Silvia D. 33 años D. edad, resiD. en Corinto departamento D. Morazán, vive con su esposo Ramón Antonio tienen cuatro hijos Adonis D. 15 años, José Neris D. 13, Dania Marlenis  y Brayan Ulises D. 6 años D. edad, quienes dependen económicamente D. ellos, ella se dedica a la venta D. antojitos y papas fritas realiza las ventas a diario desD. muy temprano se prepara para preparar la venta y luego sale a trabajar a casas D. los vecinos a realizar los oficios domésticos y por la tarD. se coloca en la venta en su carretón.
Ella está necesitando un préstamo para arreglar el carretón ya que en este realiza las ventas D. papas fritas, también comprara insumos para la preparación D. antojitos (papas, aceite, condimentos), esta ayuda le será muy importante ya que tendrá en buenas condiciones la herramienta importante para la venta que es su carretón, y también contara con los materiales necesarios para seguir en su negocio.
Sus sueños son grandes como ver a sus hijos superados sacarlos adelante con el apoyo D. préstamos a través D. esta institución e ir mejorando la calidad D. vida D. su familia.
texts.en:
Silvia is 33 years old.  She lives in the Corinto department of  Morazán with her husband Ramón Antonio.  They have four children (Adonis who is 15,  José Neris who is 13, and Dania Marlenis and Bryan Ulises who are 6 years old) who depend on them economically.  She works selling snacks and french fries, making sales daily.  Very early she gets ready to make sales, and later she goes to work at the houses of her neighbors to do her domestic work, and in the afternoon she works selling in her small cart.  

She needs a loan in order to fix her cart in which she already sells french fries.  Also, she will buy ingredients for the preparation of snacks (potatoes, oil, condiments), this help will be very important so that this important tool for her work, her cart, is in good condition.  Also she will have the materials necessary to continue her business.  Her dreams are big, like seeing her children overcome. to move her children ahead in life with the help of loans through this institution, and to continue improving the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: To repair Silvia's food cart and to buy potatoes, oil, and condiments

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Ángela reside en Semsembra, departamento de Morazán, tiene 30 años, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 14 y 13 años de edad, ellos alquilan la vivienda y se dedica a la venta de lácteos y pupuseria desde hace cuatro años, negocio que nace por la necesidad de ayudar a su esposo con ingresos para solventar necesidades del hogar.
Los lácteos los vende por la mañana y las pupusas de 6:00pm a 8:00pm, ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos necesarios para hacer la venta como chicharrón, condimentos, tomates, el crédito le ayudara a realizar las compras en mayor cantidad obteniendo un mejor precio de los proveedores y con la posibilidad de ver mejores ganancias.
Sueña con crecer en sus negocios y que a través de estos pueda obtener ganancias que le permitan ahorrar y comprase un terreno para construir su propia casa, mejorando la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ángela lives in Semsembra, in the department of Morazán.  She is 30 years old, and she lives with her husband and two children who are 14 and 13 years old.  They rent their home and she has worked selling milk products and pupusas (maize dumplings) for 4 years.  This business was born from the necessity of helping her husband with income to meet the household necessities.

She sells milk products in the morning and the pupusas from 6-8pm.  She is asking for a loan in order to buy the things she needs to make sales, like sausage, condiments, tomatoes.  The loan will help her make purchases in greater quantity and thereby get a better price from the wholesalers, meaning the possibility of seeing greater profits.  

She dreams of growing her business and through it being able to make an income that would permit her to save and to buy land to build her own home, improving the quality of life for her children.

loans.use: To buy sausage, condiments, and tomatoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy an industrial stove for Norah's food sales business

loans.name: Selva

texts.es:
La Sra. Selva es comerciante hace mas de 20 años, tiene su despensa bien surtida en el Barrio San Juan, es una persona muy luchadora porque es madre soltera y tiene a su cargo a sus padres mayores de edad. 
Tiene una hija de 13 años bien educada y que es la razón de su lucha constante, trabaja desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las once de la noche en su despensa-carnicería, también tiene venta de pollo al espiedo. 
Se acerco a la Fundación Paraguaya para solicitar apoyo crediticio para comprar bebidas,   comenta que esta muy contenta de ser bien acogida y por la confianza puesta en su persona. 
Asegura que invertirá bien su préstamo para poder devolverlo en tiempo y forma, para poder seguir trabajando con la institución.
texts.en:
Ms. Selva has been a business woman for more than 20 years.  She owns a well-stocked grocery store in the barrio of San Juan.  She is a hard worker because she is a single mother and is responsible for her elderly parents. 

She has a well-educated 13 year old daughter who is the reason for her constant struggle.  She works from 5:00 in the morning until 11:00 at night in her grocery/butcher shop.  She also sells rotisserie chicken.

She approached the Fundación Paraguaya to request a loan to buy beverages.  She tells us that she is very happy to be welcomed and for the confidence placed in her.She assures us that she will invest the loan well so that she can repay it in a timely manner in order to be able to continue working with the institution

loans.use: To purchase beverages.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra: Ana Maria; ella tiene 30 años. La socia es soltera y tiene 01 hija, ella estudió cosmetología, actualmente ella tiene un salón de belleza en el tercer paradero de ttio, la socia le puso de nombre Luanis como su pequeña hija; La socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de secadoras profesionales para su salón de belleza, la socia también comprará líquidos para hacer los permanentes, tintes de colores y de este modo ella podrá dar mejor servicio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería para su salón de belleza.

La socia está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Nuevo Amanecer Del Cusco community bank. This bank is located in the Huanchac district in the province and department of Cusco. The member is Ana Maria. She is 30 years old. The member is single and has one daughter. She studied cosmetology. Currently she has a beauty salon in the third suburb of Ttio. She gave it the name "Luanis" like her little daughter. The member wishes the loan in order to invest in the purchase of professional dryers for her salon. The member also will buy liquids for perms, dye and, in this manner, she will be able to give better service. The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her beauty salon.

The member is happy with the loan granted and she promises to make her payments at the established deadlines.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Spare parts for his mill

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor tiene 37 años, vive con su esposa y su hijo en su casa propia. Desde que era un niño aprendió las técnicas agrarias, hoy lo hace de manera independiente, por lo que han transcurrido 7 años dedicándose a la siembra de papa y de otros productos de mayor escala. En muchas ocasiones su esposa y sus hijos le apoyan en esta tarea, asimismo cría animales como: pollos y cuyes que le sirve para el consumo propio familiar, así como en la generase algún ingreso luego de venderlos en la feria de su localidad. Hasta el momento Víctor considera que las ventas de sus cosechas son rentables, y eso lo anima a intensificarse en esa actividad, por lo que espera en el futuro comprar maquinaria y contratar personal. Es el crédito número 4 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias. Agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica. Con el crédito que recibirá, comprará insumos para la agricultura como semillas y abono; asimismo contratará peones para que le ayuden en dicha siembra.
texts.en: Victor is 37 years old. He lives with his wife and their son in his own house. Since he was young, he learned farming skills. Today, he farms independently as seven years have passed dedicating himself to sowing potato and other products on a larger scale. On many occassions, his wife and their children help him with this work. Additionally, he raises animals like chicken and guinea pigs that feed his family and also generate some income when sold at the local market. When Victor realized that selling his harvest was profitable, it encouraged him to intensify his work since he hoped in the future to buy machinery and hire workers. This is his loan number four with MFP. He is very happy to know that he has financial support. Additionally, he is happy to be part of his community bank because all the members are people he knows, are responsible and very unified. He is thankful to all the people who will be loaning the money he is requesting since it will be very useful in the progress of his economic activity. With the loan that he will receive, he will buy inputs for farming such as seeds and fertilizer. Additionally, he will hire workers to help him with said planting.

loans.use: Purchase seeds and bags of fertilizer, and also hire laborers.

loans.name: Bruno

texts.es:
Bruno es pequeño comerciante, dedicado al trabajo para dar el apoyo a su familia, hoy en día tiene su propio negocio una pulpería que inicio con una venta de su propiedad de tierra herencia de sus padres. 
Luego para invertir más en productos, hace un financiamiento en Afodenic  aumentando sus niveles de venta al ofrecer más variedad en sus mercaderías, con precios accesibles al cliente. 

Con este nuevo préstamo lograra la compra de productos de consumo en granos básicos de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, bidón de aceite, maíz, golosinas, productos lácteos, cajillas de huevo entre otros, siendo estos los que más se venden.
texts.en:
Bruno is a storekeeper and is dedicated to his work so that he can support his family.  He currently has his own general store that he started by selling the property he inherited from his parents.  Later, to invest in more products he sought financing from Afodenic, increasing his sales and offering more variety in his merchandise, with more accessible prices for his clients.  

With this new loan he will be able to purchase basic consumer products, such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, corn, sweets, dairy products, cartons of eggs, etc.  These are the products that sell the most.

loans.use: To buy consumer products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, and corn in order to increase his sales

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
Banco de emprendimiento antiguo  que se encuentra en su 3er ciclo integrado por 9 integrantes los cuales todos viven en la zona del torno 
La presidenta  la Sra. Marianela  de edad de 23 años, su negocio  es el trasporte del Torno a  Santa Cruz trabaja con la renta de su vehículo hace 3 años , y como segunda actividad cuenta con la agricultura en la provincia de Valle grande hace 4 años,  su estado civil convive con el Señor Hugo, quien es transportista, tienen un hijo pequeño, el dinero del crédito lo invertirá en el mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que esta necesitando algunas reparaciones, es una señora muy trabajadora que se dedica a estas dos actividades por el bienestar de su familia.
                                                                                                     La secretaria: es la Sra. Paulina vive en la zona del torno hace 4 años, Su negocio es la venta  de refrigerio  en la zona del torno ambulante  hace 1 años.                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Estado civil convive con el señor Abundio de   actividad chofer moto taxista, los señores cuentan con 4  hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de abarrotes e insumos para preparar sus platillos.                                                                                                                                                                              Los clientes están agradecidos con la entidad por confiar nuevamente en ellos y apoyarlos cuando mas lo necesitan.
texts.en:
This long-standing community bank is in its third loan cycle.  The group has 9 members who all live in El Torno.

The bank's president, Marianela is 23 years old.  Her business is a transport business between El Torno and Santa Cruz.  She has been making income from her vehicle for three years.  Her second business activity is farming in Valle Grande province.  She has been doing this for four years.  Marianela lives with her partner Hugo who is a haulage contractor.  Together they have a young son.  Marianela will invest her loan money in having her vehicle serviced as it needs some repair work doing to it.  She is a very hard-working woman who works in her two businesses for the well-being of her family.

The bank's secretary Paulina has lived in El Torno for four years.  Her business is selling light refreshments in El Torno as an itinerant street vendor.  She has been doing this for one year.  Paulina lives with her partner Abundio who provides taxi services in his 'mototaxi' (a motorbike with a cabin in back for transporting cargo or passengers).  They have four school-age children.  Paulina will use her loan money to buy groceries and supplies to prepare her meals with.  

These clients are grateful to the institution for having placed trust in them again and for supporting them when they most need it.

loans.use: To have maintenance work done on her vehicle

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is 31 years old and single. He has been selling cement and foodstuffs for seven years. Innocent will use this loan to purchase more cement and foodstuffs to sell. With the new profits from his expanded business, he plans to build a house. In the future, he would like to become a sole distributor of cement.

loans.use: to buy more cement for sale

loans.name: Marie Jeanne

texts.en: Marie Jeanne has owned a business selling fresh dairy products for 8 years.  She is 45 years old and widowed with two children. With this loan, she will buy more liters of milk and donuts and bread to sell. She hopes to use the new profits from her business for savings. She works hard so that in the future she could own a dairy.

loans.use: to buy more milk to sell

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es:
Don Rogelio, de 40 años de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, se dedica a sembrar granos básicos, él está casado y comparte su vivienda con su esposa y cinco hijos: Iris de 14 años, Idalia de 12, Iveth de 7, Flor de 4 años de edad  y Ana de un mes de edad,  don Rogelio se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años ya que creció en un hogar donde su padre de esta actividad les dio lo necesario para su crecimiento.
El Solicita un préstamo para la recolección de granos básicos, esta actividad consiste en pagar mozos para que le ayuden a recoger la cosecha de maíz y frijol, y es a través del préstamo que él pagara a quienes le ayuden y de  esta manera dejara lista la cosecha para venderla y otra parte para el consumo familiar-
Su objetivo es seguir en esta actividad agrícola ya que es el sustento de su familia y con la ayuda de los préstamo espera cultivar un terreno más grande para las próximas temporadas.
texts.en:
Rogelio is 40 years old and lives in Corinto, located within the Morazán department.  He is a farmer who raises basic grains.  He is married and shares his life with his wife and five children; 14 year old Iris, 12 year old Idalia, 7 year old Iveth, 4 year old Flor, and one month old Ana.  Rogelio has been farming for many years, as he grew up in a home where his father was a farmer and he was able to provide for them in this way.

He is asking for this loan so that he can harvest his grains.  This involves hiring field hands to help him gather the harvest of corn and beans.  He will use the money from this loan to pay his helpers and prepare the harvest for sale and part of it to feed his family.

His goal is to continue this activity because this is his family’s sustenance.  With the help of this loan, he hopes to be able to farm a larger area next season.

loans.use: Pay for field hands

loans.name: Nola

texts.en:
Nola is 38 years old, married and has four children between the ages of four and seventeen. Currently, all four of her children attend school. 

Nola sells fresh dairy products, which she has done for six years. She works together with her husband.  Nola will use the loan to purchase more bread and milk to sell.  

With the new profits from her expanded business, Nola plans to reinvest in the business for continuous growth.

loans.use: To buy more fresh dairy products to sell

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.es:
La señorita Svetlana es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en anticretico ya hace mucho tiempo, en una casa que está ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz.
Svetlana es empleada de TOYOSA, vendiendo autos y realizando comercio exterior; además se dedica a elaborar documentos de transferencia y para esta segunda actividad  necesita una computadora.

El crédito lo utilizara justamente para la compra de una computadora. Es así como obtiene sus ingresos para su hogar.
Es su primer crédito y el análisis socioeconómico realizado la califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Svetlana is single and does not have any children. She lives in an anticrético house (a special rental arrangement available in Bolivia) located in the Alto San Pedro area of the city of La Paz.

Svetlana is employed by Toyosa, selling cars and doing external business. She also creates assignment documents and needs a computer for this second job.

She will use the loan to buy a computer because this is how she obtains her household income.

This is her first loan and the socioeconomic analysis completed qualifies her to be able to receive a loan.

loans.use: To purchase a computer to prepare assignment documents, which is her second job.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
El Señor Fredy Fernández Brañez vive en concubinato y es padre de familia de un hijo al cual apoya y ayuda en su educación junto a su pareja, hace como un año que vive con su pareja ellos viven en su chaco cuentan con una casita de madera que les sirve de refugio y de techo para dormir, es por eso que él trabaja como agricultor y como moto taxista  en la localidad de Ivirgarzama, en el cual esta hace mas de 1 año como socio activo, el servicio que brinda es rentable por la alta cantidad de personas que solicitan este servicio por la facilidad,  rapidez y eficiencia. El sindicato cuenta con paradas y turnos para cada afiliado, en diferentes puntos de la localidad de Ivirgarzama donde las personas acuden para solicitar dicho servicio.

Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un préstamo de nuestra institución cuyo destino será la compra de una nueva motocicleta, debido a que la que tiene actualmente ya cumplió su ciclo de trabajo y mejorar el servicio a sus clientes lo que le permitirá también mejorar sus ingresos y consecuente mente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fredy Fernández Brañez lives with his partner and is father to one son who he supports and helps in his education, along with his partner. He has lived with his girlfried for one year. They live in a small wooden house that serves as a refuge and a place to sleep. It is for this that he works as a farmer and as a mototaxi driver in the area of Ivirgarzama, where for more than one year he has been an active member. The service he provides is profitable due to the high quantity of people that request this service due to its ease, speed and efficiency. The union has stops and turns for each affiliate in different points of the area if Ivirgarzama where people go to request this service.

This is the first time that the client has obtained a loan from our institution. It will be used to purchase a new motorcycle since the one he has currently has already completed its working cycle and so he can improve the service for his customers which will also improve his income and consequently his quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase a new motorcycle for his job.

loans.name: Las Fresas Group

texts.es:
El grupo que a continuación presento tiene por nombre "Las Fresas", es un grupo de mujeres de la localidad de Calvario del Carmén, pertenecen al municipio de San Felipe del Progreso, esta localidad alberga una gran presa conocida como la "presa de Tepetitlan", como se encuentra la presa hay gente que se dedica a pescar charales para venderlos en el tianguis, lo que está gente hace es limpiarlos y freirlos, tambíen los guisan, o hasta los hacen en tamal para vender.

En este grupo hay una integrante que tiene como actividad lo que mencionaba, se llama Celestina Marquéz E., la señora es ama de casa pero aparte sale a pescar a la presa y prepara los charales de diferente manera.

El Grupo las "Fresas" lo integran 13 mujeres trabajadoras, son mujeres Mazahuas, hablan este idioma indigena que es parte de la cultura del pueblo de San felipe del Progreso, y no solo el idioma sino su vestimenta muestra su cultura.
Le nombraron así a su grupo porqué dicen ella que no encontraban otro nombre, ya habían mencionado varios pero todos ya estaban ocupados por otro grupo, hasta que una de las integrantes dijo: las Fresas, a todas les causo gracia y asi se llamaron, tambíen para sonar un poco original ante los demás grupos. 

Los nombres de las mujeres son los siguientes:
1.-Maria S. M., la señora tiene 40 años de edad, su actividad es una tienda de abarrotes.
2.-Irma G. G., tiene 30 años, su actividad es la compra, cria y venta de borregos.
3.- Marcelina C. Sáncehez, , es una mujer joven de 20 años, se dedica a criar pollos para vender.
4.-Juana M. C., tiene 45 años, se dedica a la compra- venta de borregos de engorda.
5.-Veronica S. M., tiene 19 años, cria borregos
6.-Antonia J. S. tiene 36 años, tiene una tienda de abarrotes
7.-Lorenza G. C., tiene 54 años, se dedica al campo y criar becerros para vender.
8.-Rosa V. N., tiene 42 años, se dedica a criar pollos y borregos
9.-Paula P. G., tiene 38 años,  se dedica a criar animales
10.- Irene T. C., tiene 38 años, tiene una tienda escolar
11.-Elidia L. L., va hacer mamá, y se dedica a una tienda afuera de la clinica
12.-Eusebia Mejía Segúndo, tiene 55 años, y se dedica a vender ganado, cria y vende vacas o toros.
13.- Celestina M. E., tiene 27 años y se dedica a la pesca, vende charales preparados listos para comer. 

La comunidad es muy humilde en general, toda la gente es de escasos recursos, no tienen estudio, por mucho la secundaria, la mayoria de la gente no sabe leer, solo se dedican al campo y a criar animales, los señores como oficio saben albañileria, y muchos salen a trabajar a  ciudad de México o E.U.

La Señora Maria S. M. encabeza la lista de los nombres en la foto aparece vestida de un sweter blanco, un vestido tipico Mazahua de color azul con franjas rojas y calcetas azul cielo, es la segunda de la foto de izquierda a derecha.

Doña Maria tiene 40 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo, en total tuvo 8 hijos lamentablemente uno de ellos fallecio, ahora solo están 7 hijos, 4 hombres y 3 mujeres, por el momento de ella depende un niño de 11 años, estudia la primaria, sus demás hijos ya trabajan y unos ya tienen su propia familia.

La actividad de doña Mari es criar becerros, y va utilizar su crédito para pagar dos milpas de zacate que le fiaron, el zacate lo ocupa para darle de comer a sus reces, tambien quiere comprar una becerrita.

Doña Mari nos comenta que una dificultad es de el mes de Abril hasta Septiembre porqué no tiene para darles de comer ya que no tiene terreno, y es en epocas de lluvia, lo que hace es pagar una renta por cada animal mensual, para que puedan comer el pasto y demás en una hacienda que está cerca de su comunidad.

El deseo de doña Mari es poder tener un espacio para sus animales como un terreno para sembrar y no comprar el zacate que lo dan caro, tambíen para poder guardar los animales. 

Tambíen doña Mari platica que al vender un animal se lo quieren pagar barato, su meta es venderlos a un buen precio para que le salga la inversión.
texts.en:
The group which is presented has the name "Las Fresas." It is a group of women from the area of Calvario del Carmen, belonging to the municipality of San Felipe del Progreso. This area is home to a large dam known as the "Dam Tepetitlan." Because of the dam, they are people that are dedicated to fishing chub to sell at the market. What these people do is clean and fry, or even stew them or make tamales to sell.

In this group, there is a member that has the job which has been mentioned. She is named Celestina M. E.. She is a housewife but she goes fishing and prepares the chub in different ways.

The "Las Fresas" group has 13 hard-working female members. They are Mazahuas women. They speak this indigenous language which is part of the cultulre of the San Felipe del Progreso village, and not only does their language demonstrate their culture but also their dress.

They named their group this way because they say that they couldn't find another name. They had mentioned various but all were already taken by other groups until one of the members said "las Fresas." This caused them to laugh and so they used this name, as well as to sound a little original beside the other groups.

The names of the women are the following:

1.-Maria S. M., She is 40 years old and has a grocery store.
2.-Irma G. G., She is 30 years old and she buys, raises and sells sheep.
3.- Marcelina C. Sáncehez, , She is a young woman of 20 years and she is dedicated to raising chicken to sell.
4.-Juana M. C., She is 45 years old and is dedicated to buying and selling fattened sheep.
5.-Veronica S. M., She is 19 and raises sheep.
6.-Antonia J. S. is 36 years old and has a grocery store.
7.-Lorenza G. C., She is 54 years old and is dedicated to raising calves to sell.
8.-Rosa V. N. is 42 years old and is dedicated to raising chicken and sheep.
9.-Paula P. G. is 38 years old and is dedicated to raising animals.
10.- Irene T. C. is 38 years old and has a school shoop. 
11.-Elidia L. L. is a mother and is dedicated to a shop outside the clinic.
12.-Eusebia Mejía Segúndo is 55 years old is is dedicated to raising and selling cattle and bulls.
13.- Celestina M. E. is 27 years old and is dedicated to fishing and selling chubs prepared ready to eat.

The community is very humble in general. All of the people come from scarce resources. They don't have secondary education. The majority of people don't know how to read. They are only dedicated to farming and raising animals. The men know masonry work and many leave to work in cities in Mexico or the U.S.

Maria S. M.  is head of the list of names. In the photo, she appears clothed in a white sweater, a typical Mazahua blue dress with red stripes and sky blue socks. She is the second in the photo from left to right.

Maria is 40 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband. In total, she had eight children. However, one of them died. Now there are only seven children: 4 boys and 3 girls. At the moment, one 11 year old boy depends on her. He is in elementary school. Her other children work and one has his own family.

Mari's activity is raising calves. She is going to use her loan to pay two two corn fields of grass that they rented. They occupy the fields to give food to their animals. She also wants to buy a calf.

Mari tells us that one of the difficulties of the months from April until September is feeding her animals since she doesn't have land and it is the rainy season. What she does is pay a monthly rent for each animal so they can eat the pasture and the others can go to a farm that is near the community.

Mari's wish is to be able to have a space for her animals like land to farm and not to buy the corn field which is expensive. She also wants to be able to guard the animals. Mari also says that when she sells an animal, it's cheap. Her goal is to sell them at a good price so she gets something back for her investment.

loans.use: Purchase food and raise animals (calves) to sell.

loans.name: Dominique

texts.en:
Dominique owns a business that sells soft drinks. She is 40 years old, married and has five children who are between four months and eighteen years old. Her husband is a driver. 

Dominique has been selling soft drinks for sixteen years.  Her loan will be used to buy more milk, bread, mineral water, and juice to sell. 

She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy living room furniture. She dreams to have a supermarket in the future.

loans.use: To buy more milk, bread, mineral water, and juice to sell

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
En Yaguarón,  se reunieron unas mujeres con el fin de  invertir en su actividad y otras para emprender actividades productivas, de ahí que se dispusieron a realizar la reunión para interiorizarse sobre el programa, quienes aceptaron por los beneficios brindados por el programa.
El comité lleva por nombre Virgen del Rosario, actualmente se encuentran en el cuarto ciclo, integrada por 18  emprendedoras señoras, quienes ponen lo mejor de si para aumentar sus ingresos.
 Todas las integrantes son luchadoras y guapas quienes han invertido sus préstamos en sus respectivas actividades y por medio de eso brindarle lo mejor posible a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Concepcion quien se dedica a la venta de mercasderias de primera necesidad para el consumo familiar.
Ella se encuentra satisfecha con su negocio ya que nos comenta que la ayuda a alimentar muy bien a su familia por que cubre con todos los gastos. 
Por ello para ella siempre conviene invertir en la compra de mercaderias para surtir la despensa .
Solicita el prestamo para la compra de mercaderias como fideos, azucar, arroz, panificados y otros.
texts.en:
In the city of Yaguaron a group of women came together with the common goal of investing in their businesses and to learn about new productive businesses. Since then they have endeavored to join the program, a welcome event for the benefits the programs brings.

The group's name is Virgen del Rosario and they are currently on their fourth loan cycle. It is made up of 18 enterprising women who put their best foot forward with the goal of improving their incomes.

The members of the group are hard working, beautiful women who have invested their loans in their respective businesses in order to provide their families with the best possible. One of the members is Concepcion and she has a general store from where she sells basic needs products for the entire family.  She is very happy with her business because it helps keep her family well fed and she is able to cover all their expenses. 

She is always ready to invest in the purchase of merchandise to supply her store. She requests a loan to purchase pastas, sugar, rice, and pastries among other items.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to stock a general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase items of clothing for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana, reside en San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y su primer hija de 15 meses, se dedica a la panadería, tiene 30 años de edad, este negocio es herencia familiar, ella es panificadora y administra el negocio desde hace 2 años con un horario de lunes a sábado de 8:00am a 8:30 pm, este negocio es su fuerte y es de él de donde obtienen los ingresos para solventar las diferentes situaciones económicas.
Ella desea comprar harina, levadura, azúcar entre otros materiales que forman parte del proceso para la elaboración del pan, dicho préstamo le ayudara a mantener un buen inventario, en ocasiones a aumentar la producción  y tener mejores oportunidades de crecimiento.
