Sueña con tener un inventario grande, propio, ampliar la panadería y darse a conocer en nuevos lugares para desarrollarse como una microempresaria.
texts.en:
Susana lives in San Miguel, in the region of San Miguel. She lives with her husband and their first daughter; she is 15 months old. She is a baker, she is 30 years old, and the business is a family inheritance. She has been the baker and administrator of the business for the past 2 years, working from Monday to Saturday, from 8am to 8:30pm. This business is her strength and it is through this business that she is able to obtain the income she needs to pay for her various expenses. 

She wishes to purchase flour, yeast, sugar and other ingredients that she needs to make bread. This loan will help her keep a well stocked inventory and it will allow her to increase productions during some occasions and to have greater business development opportunities.

She dreams of having a larger inventory of ingredients to expand her baker and to make her known to in new neighborhoods. She dreams of improving as a small business owner.

loans.use: To purchase flour, yeast, and sugar.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MINKA”; Este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr: Arturo; el socio tiene 74 años de edad, el socio es casado y tiene 5 hijos, el socio es cesante del ministerio de economía y minas, el trabajo en dicha institución y ahora goza de sus mensualidades de ser jubilado pero siempre ha estado en este grupo y le gusta como se organizan y crecen con las actividades que hacen internamente, el socio indica que esta vez desea el crédito para apoyar a uno de sus hijos menores en pagar una última mensualidad de su carrera profesional de economía. El socio solicita el  préstamo para invertir en el pago de la última mensualidad del menor de sus hijos.

El socio está feliz con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Here is a member who belongs to the community bank named "Minka". It is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province and region of Cusco.

His name is Arturo. He is 74 years old, he is married and he has 5 children. He is a retiree from the Ministry of Finance and Mines. From his work in that organization he is able to enjoy a monthly pension.  He has always been part of the group and he likes the way it is organized and the activities that take place internally. He wants a loan to be able to help his youngest son to pay for the last semester of tuition in his university career in Economics. He requests a loan to invest in the payment the tuition for his youngest son.

He is very happy with the loan that is granted and he is committed to the established payment terms of his loan.

loans.use: To pay his son's final semester in university.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is 32 years old, married and has three children between eight and twelve years old. Currently, all three of her children attend school. 

Vestine sells soaps, rice, and sugar, which she has been doing for five years. She works with her husband. Vestine will use the loan to buy more home products to sell.  

With the new profits from her expanded business, Vestine plans to buy her own building for business purposes instead of renting. She would like to have a loan amount of five million in the future.

loans.use: To buy more soaps, rice, and sugar to sell

loans.name: Ana Betty

texts.es:
Ana, resiD. en San Miguel, vive con su esposo y sus hijos D. 19, 8, 6 años D. edad, tiene 31 años D. edad, se dedica a la venta D. tortillas, este negocio lo atienD. desD. hace 4 años D. 9:00am a 1:30 pm, ella aprendió a hacer las tortillas y por la necesidad D. ayudar a su esposo y sus hijos decidió instalar el negocio.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra D. maíz y leña que son los materiales que necesita para hacer las tortillas, lo que busca ella es aumentar la producción ya que la demanda es buena lo que le generara ingresos mayores para el hogar.
Sueña con acumular ganancias para poder comprar su propia vivienda y dejar D. alquilar con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana lives in San Miguel with her husband and their children aged 19, 8 and 6 years.  She is 31 years old, and has a business selling tortillas.  She has run this business for 4 years, and she works from 9am until 1:30pm.  She learned to make the tortillas, and due to the need to help her husband and their children she decided to set up a business.

Now she needs a loan to buy corn and firewood, which are the supplies she needs to make tortillas.  She is seeking to increase her production, since the demand is good, and this will generate more income for her household.

She dreams of accumulating savings so that she could buy her own home, this way she and her family would not have to live in a rental.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood

loans.name: Leatitia

texts.en:
Leatitia owns a business that sells hair products, shampoo conditioners, and styling products. She is 34 years old, married and has one child. 

Leatitia has been selling hair products, shampoo conditioners, and styling products for eleven years. With this loan, she will buy more hair products to sell. 

She hopes to use the new profits from her business to hire skilled barbers.

loans.use: To buy more shampoo conditioners and styling products to sell

loans.name: Roda

texts.en:
Roda owns a beauty salon. She is 48 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband is a businessman. 

Roda has been working in the beauty salon for thirteen years. She has requested this loan to buy more hair products, hair relaxer, and salon mirrors. 

She hopes to use the new profits from her business to have an extra big salon for more customers.

loans.use: To buy more hair relaxer and other hair products to sell

loans.name: Fany

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORI ORCCO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Fany; ella tiene 43 años de edad, soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de promotora de espectáculos, la socia suele traer algunos grupos musicales para algunos eventos que se realizan en el distrito de Urcos,la socia es una persona muy alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.   

La socia solicita el préstamo para implementar su negocio y para comprar algunos productos de primera necesidad que necesita para su hogar.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Fany belongs to the communal bank "Qori Orcco."  This bank is located in the Urcos district, which is part of Quispicanchis province in the department of Cusco.

Fany is 43 years old, single, and has 2 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business promoting shows.  She often brings musical groups for some events that occur in the Urcos district.  She is a very cheerful person who has a strong desire to get ahead.

She requests a loan for her business, and also to buy some basic consumer products that she needs for her household.

She is happy to have the opportunity to take this loan, and promises to comply with the repayment terms.

loans.use: she requests a loan for her business, and also to buy some basic necessities for her household
